**The Supreme Vast Boundless Primordial Perfected Wenchang Great Cavern Immortal Scripture**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Vast Boundless Primordial Perfected Wenchang Great Cavern Immortal Scripture*. Originally collated by the Master of Moyi Cave of Ganshan. According to the preface, it was transmitted by Lord Wenchang to the Daoist Liu Ansheng in the *wuzi* year of the Qiandao reign of the Southern Song, and later recollated by the Daoist Luo Yizi in the autumn of the *jiazi* year of the Jingding reign. Printed and disseminated in the year of *shetige*.

This text was modeled after the *Highest Clarity Great Cavern Scripture* and the *Numinous Treasure Scripture of Salvation for Humanity*. Five scrolls in total. Base text from the *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Cavern Reality Division*, *Original Texts* category.

---

**The Supreme Vast Boundless Primordial Perfected Wenchang Great Cavern Immortal Scripture, Scroll One**

**Preface by the Celestial Worthy of the Nine Heavens’ Transformative Governance, Clarity and True Contemplation, Treasure Radiance, Compassionate Response, and Eternal Life**

Collated by the Supreme Mystery and Unsurpassed Highest Virtue Perfected Lord, Master of Moyi Cave of Ganshan

I once lived as a farmer, and while tilling the fields, I unearthed a golden statue beneath my hoe. Upon inquiring with the village elders, I was told it was an image of the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning. Long ago, when Yu the Great governed the waters, he smelted metal to fashion this statue to pacify the sacred peaks. I had worshipped it with incense and offerings without the slightest negligence. Yet when a sea storm churned the waves beyond human strength to withstand, I, on behalf of the people, cast the golden statue into the raging waters. Thereupon, the winds and tides receded, and the entire region found peace.

I had long pondered this event when one evening, a radiance stretched across the sky above the sandy shoals. Digging there, I recovered the original statue and returned it to build a temple for its enshrinement. The people of the region joined me in its veneration, and over the years, its numinous responses became too numerous to record.

My parents, alas, perished in a pestilence. I built a hut beside their graves, tending the earth around them. Then, three divine beings—Perfected Zhen Dingguang, Yu Luoqiao, and Guang Miaoyin—appeared before me, clad in hempen headscarves, feathered robes, and straw sandals. They bestowed upon me a volume of the *Great Cavern Scripture*, saying: "Recite this morning and evening, and you shall surely attain good fruits. Among the Three Powers, above, it may aid the souls of your parents and ancestors, liberating them from dark suffering; in the middle, it may eradicate sins, dispel calamities, prolong life, and augment blessings; below, it may protect your clan and save others, ensuring their preservation. You may offer gold and silk to us three, and we shall memorialize your devotion."

That very day, I followed their command, preparing a vegetarian feast and presenting gold and silks to receive their teachings. Thereafter, I recited the scripture morning and night without cease, and its numinous responses were manifold. Once, during a scorching summer, a great flood submerged my parents’ graves. I reverently presented the golden statue and recited the *Great Cavern Scripture*, vowing to complete a thousand recitations to ensure their safety. The following autumn, incessant rains swelled the streams into a single torrent, and my fear grew. Yet when the waters receded, I saw that the valley before the graves had transformed into a vast, solid plain, over a *li* in breadth. From then on, the pines and catalpas remained unharmed.

I had long grieved that my parents died of pestilence, hating the plague demons with a bone-deep enmity. Though the paths of the living and the dead diverge, I lacked the power to exact vengeance. Thus, I diligently recited the *Great Cavern Immortal Scripture* morning and evening, entreating the golden statue with utmost sincerity, praying for the might to subdue the plague demons.

Three years later, I suddenly dreamed that the golden statue spoke to me: "You have mastered the *Great Cavern Immortal Scripture*, but you have not yet seen the *Great Cavern Register of Methods*. Today, I shall bestow it upon you to quell demonic forces. This will not only fulfill your original vow but also aid Heaven’s transformative work, assisting the state and saving the people." From its sleeve, it produced two texts, which I received with a hundred bows. The first was the *Great Cavern Register*, and the second, the *Great Cavern Methods*.

Upon waking, I found the two books at my pillow. I prepared a vegetarian feast, placed them in a sacred casket, and chose an auspicious day to examine them. As I read the passage, *"When the ten thousand armored soldiers of the Great Cavern Heaven descend to deliver..."*, suddenly, wind and thunder darkened the day. Countless figures in golden armor and crimson sashes arrayed themselves before me, bowing to receive my command. One holding a red banner stood at their fore, saying, "We await your orders."

Still in a daze, I unthinkingly shouted: "I command you to subdue the plague demons! In this village, an entire household lies stricken—go and drive them out!" At once, the banner-bearer led over a hundred soldiers into the house. In an instant, they emerged, dragging five demonic agents. Some wore tiger skins, some wore rooster crowns, some resembled humans, others crows or donkeys and horses. All wielded tools of water, fire, feathers, and chisels.

Enraged, I rebuked them, threatening to annihilate their forms. They pleaded: "We disciples arise from the yearly cycles, formed by the *qi* of the seasons. We roam in fixed directions, afflicting those destined to suffer. Those punished by dark judgments endure calamity; those whose heavenly mandate is severed meet death. This is not our private doing. It begins with the Three Officials and Five Peaks, who memorialize the Jade Emperor, presenting the sins of mortals. Thereupon, the Emperor commands the Three Officials and Five Peaks to spread illness. The Year Star’s register assigns our tasks, and we act strictly according to the ledger. If the Perfected Master grants us leniency, we shall henceforth obey restraints. Wherever we encounter the talismans and registers of the Perfected Master, we shall not dare to approach."

I then instructed them according to the scripture’s methods, and they departed. Thereafter, whenever villagers fell ill with pestilence, I provided them with talismans and methods, and all were saved. Through these registers and methods, I rescued countless afflicted souls. My name spread far and wide, and scholars, commoners, officials, and clerics flocked to my door seeking healing, their numbers beyond count.

I accumulated profound merit and wondrous deeds, all through reciting the *Great Cavern Immortal Scripture* and obtaining the *Great Cavern Register of Methods*. Thus, I could fully manifest divine efficacy, rectify the proper, expel the perverse, deliver the living, ferry the dead, dispel calamities, and prolong life.

Later, in unseen realms, mighty ghosts and spirits, as well as the valiant souls of local shrines, came to request that I recite the scripture for their benefit. They expressed their gratitude, saying: "By the power of the Perfected Master’s scripture, our virtue and might have increased, and our names have been inscribed in the registers of good spirits."

Should lost souls and lingering spirits unable to attain rebirth appear—manifesting in dreams or possessing forms to beseech me for scripture-recitation and merit-transference—they would all express their gratitude, saying: "By the power of this scripture, we have escaped the苦趣 and all obtained rebirth."

When seasonal epidemics spread unchecked, one need only recite this scripture and perform the register rites, dispatching the *Plague-Dispelling Talisman*, *Plague-Cutting Talisman*, *Plague-Stilling Talisman*, and summoning the celestial couriers and armored legions to command the Nine Divisions of officials: the *Plague-Seizing, Plague-Consuming Officers*; *Toxin-Seizing, Toxin-Consuming Officers*; *Evil-Seizing, Evil-Consuming Officers*; *Qi-Seizing, Qi-Consuming Officers*; *Ghost-Seizing, Ghost-Consuming Officers*; *Calamity-Seizing, Calamity-Consuming Officers*; *Essence-Seizing, Essence-Consuming Officers*; *Divine Physician Officers for Healing*; and *Talisman-Wielding, Shrine-Destroying Officers*. Each division leads its armored troops, joined by the five hundred million black-clad cavalry of the Northern Celestial Officials, the Venerable Canglao, the Venerable Magu, and the Diamond Vajra Warriors, to apprehend the malevolent forces.

First, a memorial is sent to the Year Sovereign, then a petition to Mount Tai, before delegating authority to the City Gods and Earth Deities, who dispatch the Epidemic Envoys. If the perverse resist the rectification and refuse to disperse, or violate the covenant upon hearing the scripture, they are then reported and annihilated.

The Great Dao cherishes compassion; the Supreme Clarity ever embodies goodness. The Celestial Emperor delights in life and extends benevolence to halt killing. Those who practice the scripture and register rites must not act with private harshness, lest they incur heavenly censure. One should dispatch them with propriety, honor them with scripture, awe them with register rites, and exhort them with virtuous deeds—this is the swift path of expedient cultivation.

Practitioners of this scripture and register rites must exercise careful discernment to establish profound merit. This scripture is revered and mighty, capable of resolving karmic entanglements, settling tomb disputes, halting heavenly retributions, dissolving curses, lifting offenses, pacifying graves and dwellings, calming military and government affairs, stilling warfare, ending epidemics, praying for wind and rain, summoning auspicious omens, ensuring silkworm and grain harvests, protecting life and body, shielding clans, aiding the state, securing borders, restraining insects and tigers, averting droughts and floods, vanquishing demons, quelling myriad evils, pacifying the spirits of sacrificial rites, aiding the souls of ancestors, and delivering lost and lingering spirits. All these may be accomplished by holding fasts, reciting scriptures, and performing the Dao.

For treating illnesses and neutralizing poisons, there is the *Divine Prescription of the Purple Court Heavenly Physician*—a remnant grace of the Golden Empress of Yu the August, extending to all generations, sparing people from untimely deaths and freeing them from the scourge of epidemics. Those who uphold this teaching should seek out and study it to attain immortal merit.

In a former life in Wu and Kuaiji, through the merit of this scripture, I attained the rank of Brahmā-Conquering Tathāgata. Thereafter, through unwavering recitation, I realized the fruition of Supreme Clarity’s *Imperial Sovereign of Unbounded Joy and Nurturing Heaven*, the *Venerable Perfected of Luminous Purity and Merciful Response, Eternal Life of Rebirth*. By diligent recitation of the scripture, I ascended to the nobility of the Upper Clarity—how could one not deeply revere and transmit it?

Those who receive and recite it must strive to practice it, aspiring to ascend together with the assembly of Wenchang in the cultivation of wondrous deeds.

*Revealed in the autumn of the wùzǐ year of the Qián Dào era at the Phoenix Terrace, received by Liú Ānshèng. Re-revealed in the autumn of the jiǎzǐ year of the Jǐngdìng era, re-collated at the Biē Tóu Mountain’s Mó Wéi Cave, with the Golden Lotus Stone serving as the ritual altar, received by Luó Yìzǐ. Thereafter, on the ninth day of the ninth month in the yǐchǒu year of the Xuánmò era, again revealed at the Xīlíng Guìyán Wèishēng Zǒngzhēn Altar:*

The *Scripture of Salvation* and the *Great Cavern Scripture* are the ancestors of all scriptures; the Pearl of Millet and the Treasure of Cānghú are the sources of all sages. These two scriptures, though bearing different names, share a single origin—giving birth to heaven and establishing earth, gestating the mysterious and dividing the primordial. They are no deceptive words to delude the world, but the essential means to enter sageliness and generate spirit. They govern creation and turn the pivot of the cosmos. Their words lack ornate rhyme, their verses eschew florid embellishment—thus they are profound and abstruse, difficult to fathom in detail. They are treasures cherished by the heavens above.

From the Boundless to the present, how could they be allowed to fall into neglect? Yet people today know only to recite the *Scripture of Salvation* and remain unaware of the *Great Cavern Scripture*. For the *Scripture of Salvation*, I once composed verses to embellish its meaning, but the *Great Cavern Scripture* has lacked such adornment. Now, I command the attendant disciples to carve woodblocks and disseminate it, and I shall also compose hymns to illuminate its virtue, that readers may more easily understand and reciters more readily awaken.

**Preface to the Scripture’s Meaning**
From the primordial tones of Cānghú’s burning sand,
Sealed in celestial script to ferry heaven’s kin.
The Great Mysterious Dao’s father sought its transmission,
And only then did the *Great Cavern Scripture* descend to the world.

**Cultivating the True Dao**
Mortals of the vast earth seek to awaken the truth,
Yet the path to immortality is distant and hard to find.
If you wish for a swift and unerring way,
Recite and hold the *Great Cavern Scripture* in heart and mouth.

**Praying for Offspring and Prosperity**
The virtue of past ancestors was slight,
And this life’s prosperity and descendants are fraught with hardship.
If you wish your prayers to align with your desires,
How can it compare to diligently studying the *Great Cavern Scripture*?

**Averting Heavenly Disasters**
Sun and moon lose their light, suffering eclipse,
Stars stray from their courses, disrupting celestial patterns.
To dispel heavenly calamities and bring peace to the common folk,
Let the worthy recite the *Great Cavern Scripture* together.

**Praying for Wind, Rain, and Bountiful Harvests**
Drought demons bring disaster, rain falls like gold,
Locusts and floods leave no grain to harvest.
To ensure universal abundance and no famine,
Prayers rely entirely on the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Transforming the Common Folk**
Artisans, merchants, farmers, and all four classes,
Greedily pursue gain, unaware of the karma they carry.
Amidst busyness, carve out a moment of leisure,
And study the *Great Cavern Scripture* of Wenchang.

**Pacifying Treasury and Halting Warfare**
Treasuries overflow with wealth and resources,
Weapons forever stilled in joyful peace.
The people sing of the Dao’s governance, seeking lasting order—
Repay the nation by diligently studying the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Pacifying Ghosts and Spirits**
Earth deities, shrine spirits, and all numinous beings,
Seek promotion yet lack the means.
To ascend the registers of good spirits and augment their power,
They must listen to the *Great Cavern Scripture* day and night.

**Aiding Ancestral Spirits**
The souls of kin—parents and ancestors—
Linger long in the underworld, unable to ascend.
If you wish to deliver them but lack the means,
Fast and diligently study the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Resolving Tomb Disputes**
Tomb disputes and summonses burden descendants,
Coupled with heavenly retributions in the celestial court.
For generations, misfortunes are passed down—
To resolve them, one should study the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Resolving Offenses Against Graves and Dwellings**
Whether renovating homes or constructing graves,
Breaking ground offends the inauspicious spirits.
This brings misfortunes upon the household—
To resolve and pacify them, hold fast to the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Dispelling Pestilence**
When the Year-Star governs the Five Pestilences,
Plagues spread through towns and villages, harming the people.
To protect neighborhoods from contagion,
Maintain strict purity and study the *Great Cavern Scripture* together.

**Curing Illness**
When monthly afflictions and yearly calamities linger in the body,
One seeks physicians, divination, and gods in vain.
With no means of relief and nowhere to turn,
Entrust your fate to the Dao and take refuge in the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Delivering Sunken Souls and Stagnant Spirits**
The six kinds of karmic souls—men and women—
Dwell in darkness, bound to the shadowy underworld.
To universally proclaim their deliverance to the celestial realms,
Frequently study the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Untangling Karmic Grievances**
The six paths of karmic foes weave deep entanglements,
Vengeance upon vengeance—when will it end?
To bring joy to each and all,
There is nothing but listening to the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Ending Curses**
Whether over wealth or wrath,
A moment’s fury invokes the gods.
When ghostly lawsuits form, when will they cease?
Only the *Great Cavern Scripture* can dissolve them.

**Quelling Calamities**
Illness, death, and misfortune cling to the body,
Official disasters and bandits bring bitter oppression.
Wealth scatters like melting ice—
For protection, hold fast to the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Eradicating Demonic Beings**
Spirits of trees, stones, foxes, monkeys, and dogs,
Hurl bricks, set fires, and take human form.
They wield power, demand lewd sacrifices—
To exterminate them, study the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Opening the Mind and Sharpening Wisdom**
Scholars and students with minds choked by weeds,
Child prodigies who falter in response—
To wield the brush with divine aid,
First cultivate the habit of holding the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Preserving Form and Life**
This body is like illusion, like a bubble,
Yet within its qi and spirit lies the path to true cultivation.
To preserve form and life, aligning with Heaven,
Diligently ponder the *Great Cavern Scripture* of Wenchang.

**Admonishing the Wealthy**
Do not rely on vast wealth amassed at home,
For Heaven’s decree can strip your fortune and topple your prosperity.
When the time is ripe to cultivate merit,
Sacrifice your wealth to print and distribute the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Accounts of Efficacy**
With a heart of sincerity reaching the Supreme Clarity,
One receives transmission from the Three Spirits.
This body attains the fruit of Heavenly Worthies—
All because of diligent study of the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Two Universal Exhortations**
Hear my earnest words on the *Great Cavern Scripture*,
Its profound mysteries truly beyond naming.
Its boundless merits defy thought—
I urge all mortals not to take it lightly.

The Primordial Heavenly King expounded the Great Vehicle,
Only those with karmic affinity encounter this sacred scripture.
If one can study and recite it steadfastly to the end,
They shall join the assembly of Wenchang.

**Qinghe Elder’s Eulogy on Essential Teachings**
The Three Caverns’ scriptures treasure jade-like sounds,
Their words resplendent, scattered like pearls and gold.
They avert disasters, ward off misfortunes, and birth heaven and earth,
Delivering all beings as numerous as the sands of the Ganges.

The Great Dao unfurls, weaving the Cavern’s text,
Its aid to people and benefit to creatures boundless.
If mortal beings wish to become soaring immortals,
For my sake, purify your heart and read this wondrous chapter.

The Dao is fundamentally soundless—how could it have words?
Yet the sages established teachings to forcefully transmit it.
To catch fish, one must rely on the power of the trap;
Once the fish is caught, what need remains for the trap?

When the Primordial One first transmitted the *Great Cavern Scripture*,
Its single sound resounded for all to hear.
The lamp of Dharma was passed on by later generations—
Not only by Heavenly Worthies and Dao Lords.

When the divine wind is still and the sea cloudless,
Heaven and earth are serene, the four qi pure.
If even one karmic thread stirs in delusion,
The celestial pivot turns once more without cease.

On auspicious days and favorable hours, recite the scripture well,
Let not worldly cares entangle the mind.
When the work of aiding people and benefiting creatures is complete,
Your name shall be inscribed on jade tablets and golden registers.

Neither existent nor nonexistent, originally pure,
Beyond form, beyond sound, transcending all comparison.
Where depiction and description fail to reach,
The subtle image within the Mystery is most distinct.

The highest true beings, devoid of qi,
Have endured from the Dragon Han era to the present.
Unchanging, unaugmented, they are quiescence itself—
This is called the Great Dharma Body.

Contemplate the talismanic decree—it proclaims itself,
Able to release those bound in dark prisons of suffering.
Returning to the origin, restoring the primordial, it revives life,
So that all may ascend at every moment.

Impurities arise from the mind’s obscurity,
The three paths and five sufferings burden form and soul.
When the light of Heaven washes away the roots and dust,
Immortal transformation dawns as one bows to the Supreme.

Gradually entering non-action, attaining the Dao’s essence,
Not a speck of dust clings, the mind is perfectly attuned.
Glancing back at the three thousand realms below,
All dharmas dissolve into emptiness.

The Great Dharma Body, formless and traceless,
Neither born nor destroyed, is called the Perfected True One.
Though countless kalpas of stone wear away,
Its tranquil divine radiance remains ever bright.

After traversing the arduous roads of life’s passes,
This time, joy comes with one’s name on the golden tablet.
Who can restrain the aspirations of a true man?
Returning in glory, one rides freely like a team of four horses.

To study the Dao, rely on abundant wisdom,
Lest the clear river swell with wind and waves.
Melt the heart and enter beyond the cinnabar clouds—
What can the spears and halberds of the world do to me?

**Preface to the *Scripture of Transformative Enlightenment from the Nine Heavens***
Composed by the Perfected Lord of Merit-Gathering at the Northern Bureau

This scripture was proclaimed by the Golden Mouth of the Most High,
Solely to save beings in the final kalpa.
Upon concluding the discourse, it was entrusted by jade decree
To be stored in the Jade Palace’s inner sanctum.

A command was issued to all heavens to propagate its teachings,
And all Perfected Ones to transmit it accordingly.
Thus, it was transmitted and descended to eight altars,
Yet only Shaoxi’s numinous response saw it gathered and printed,
While others merely copied and recited it.

The people of Dingzhou excel in goodness beyond other prefectures,
And the transformative enlightenment of the Great Emperor is most profound in this land.
My own incense offerings have continued for over a decade,
Unmixed and unwavering from beginning to end.
Only Wenchang’s numinous response has been particularly commendable here, descending to transmit it.

Moreover, I urge the faithful to carve blocks and print it for distribution—
Now, fortunately, the task is complete.

Alas!

All who appear in the green registers and receive this scripture—are they not those who seek life and wish to escape the sufferings of war, plague, and pestilence? Yet I say: merely receiving the scripture is not enough; one must recite it to be sufficient. And even reciting it is not enough; one must practice it to be complete.

What is practice? It is filial piety, fraternal duty, loyalty, obedience, impartiality, and forbearance. These are not difficult—they are merely the three words: *abide in one’s proper place*. Such are my words. They can dispel the kalpa’s tribulations. Whether you doubt or believe, what have I to do with it?

**Rites for Recitation**
When reciting the scripture, one must fast and bathe, don fresh and pure garments, enter the chamber, light incense, knock the teeth nine times, and bow in the heart to the Nine Heavens. Visualize the Primordial Heavenly King of the Origin and the host of exalted Perfected Ones, the Seven-Curved Great Emperor of Transformative Enlightenment, and the immortal officials descending to the dharma assembly, all arrayed in the void. Only then recite the incantations.

**Incantation for Purifying Heart and Mouth**
Spirits of the cinnabar pearl mouth, expel filth and disperse miasma.
Spirit of the tongue, rectify order, connect life and nourish the spirit.
Spirits of the thousand teeth, repel evil and guard the true.
Spirit of the throat, fierce as a tiger, extend *qi* and draw forth essence.
Spirit of the heart, cinnabar origin, let me commune with the true.
Contemplate the spirit, refine the fluid—may the Dao’s *qi* endure forever.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!

**Incantation for Purifying the Body**
Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, pacify and comfort this bodily form.
Disciples’ souls and spirits, five viscera in profound darkness,
Azure Dragon and White Tiger, arrayed in splendid ranks,
Vermilion Bird and Dark Warrior, attend and guard my true self.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!

**Incantation for Purifying the Three Karmas**
Within this body’s inner realms, thirty-six thousand beings dwell.
In movement, action, concealment, and retreat—through kalpas past and future—
May this body ever abide in freedom, ever dwell within the Three Treasures.
When the kalpa collapses, may this body never perish.
As this incantation is recited, may the three karmas be wholly purified.

**Incantation for Dispelling Filth**
Essence of the Great One, blossom of the Well Star,
Flowing to bathe the body at noon, sweeping filth and expelling evil at dusk.
Pure as a luminous pearl, immaculate as a lotus blossom,
Transform into a body of golden light, step upon clouds of brocade and rosy dawn,
Ascend the seven-jeweled hall, become a true immortal.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Nine Heavens’ Transformative Sovereign, the Primordial August Emperor commands!

**Incantation for Purifying Heaven and Earth**
Heaven and Earth in primordial chaos, foul *qi* disperses like petals.
Within the cavernous void, radiance illumines the Great Origin.
The Three Clarities’ jade decrees, light shines upon the nine thoroughfares.
Mighty spirits of the eight directions, let me be as nature intends.
Numinous Treasure talismanic command, proclaimed throughout the Nine Heavens.
*Gan luo da na*, penetrating the stellar pivot of the Great Mystery,
Sever demons, bind evil, slay ten thousand ghosts.
Incantation of Mount Zhong, jade script of the Origin.
Recite once to repel ghosts and prolong life,
Pressing forth to the Five Peaks, known to the Eight Seas.
Demon kings bow their heads, attending my chariot.
Malevolence and filth swept clean—may the Dao’s *qi* ever abide.

**Incantation for Purifying the Altar**
When the Most High preached the Dharma, golden bells chimed five notes.
All filth hid in the ninefold earth; demon hordes guarded the *qian* grove.
Heavenly flowers scattered as Dharma rain; Dharma drums shook the deluded from slumber.
All heavens rejoiced—how excellent! Golden youths strummed jade zithers.
May the eight rosy dawns’ radiance pour forth, illuminating my heart of refuge.
Swiftly ascend the great Dharma bridge, soaring to the depths of the five clouds.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!

**Incantation for Pacifying the Local Deity**
The Origin establishes and pacifies, proclaiming to the ten thousand spirits.
True officials of mountains and rivers, numinous deities of the land,
Altars to the left, millet to the right—let none dare recklessly disturb.
Turn toward the true Dao, within and without made solemn and pure.
Each abides in its proper place, guarding the imperial court in readiness.
The Most High has decreed: hunt down and capture demonic essences.
Dharma-protecting divine kings, safeguard the recitation of scriptures.
Take refuge in the Great Dao—*yuan*, *heng*, *li*, *zhen*.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!

**Incantation of the Five Stars**
The Five Stars array their radiance, shining brilliantly in the five directions.
Water engenders and averts disaster; Wood’s virtue brings prosperity.
Mars dissolves calamities; Venus repels warfare.
Saturn stabilizes the four quarters—household and state flourish and prosper.
Names inscribed on jade tablets, characters recorded in the imperial chamber,
Riding the whirlwind, fanning the light, soaring through the great void,
Emerging and entering the unseen, roaming and feasting in the ten directions.
Five-colored clouds float as canopies, summoning spirits and commanding winds,
Commanding the ten thousand spirits, above to protect the immortal elders.

**Opening the Brazier**
Most High True Lord of the Three Heavens’ Primordial Origin, Three *Qi* of the Great Shang, Lord Lao, summon forth the thirty-six officers of the Three and Five Merit Officials within our bodies, the left and right attending envoys, the incense-bearing dragon-riding couriers, the incense-attending Golden Youths, the message-transmitting and flower-scattering Jade Maidens, the Five Thearchs’ direct talismans and daily incense officials—thirty-six each, emerge!

Silently visualize them emerging in solemn attire, opening the gates. Here, on this land’s true officials’ domain, where we burn incense and recite scriptures, Golden Youths waft smoke, numinous consorts scatter flowers, and the true sages of the Three Realms gather before our chariot.

We humbly pray: after reciting this scripture, may true *qi* circulate throughout,
Above, to protect and preserve the ancestral altars, pacify and serve the emperor, dispel disasters of war, water, and fire, and eliminate plagues of pestilence, drought, and locusts;
In the middle, to extend longevity, protect and bless the entire household, dissolve the nine stars’ and eight difficulties’ misfortunes, and free them from the burdens of the five sufferings and three calamities;
Below, to inscribe names in the black ledgers, release them from the ghostly realm, ascend the seven ancestors to immortality, and enable the deceased to attain the Dao.

Next, we pray for the people of different surnames: may they ride the scripture’s Dharma to flourish in ten thousand blessings; for the creatures of mountains and marshes: may they feel the sagely merit and all transcend to the Dao’s shore. May we be spared from illness and calamity, our thoughts ever turned to the true and the Dao, our minds cleansed and hearts stilled, aspiring to ascend lightly. Aiding others and benefiting all beings, establishing merit as the foremost task—whatever we pray for, may it swiftly be granted, known throughout heaven above and earth below.

The rites of praise now complete, we rely upon your light to repent:
Seven-Curved Merciful Venerable, true master of the teaching,
Merciful father, merciful mother, born together with me.
Children born as sacred children are all filial and kind;
Grandchildren who continue as divine grandchildren are all kind and filial.
One family’s harmonious qi knows no end;
For ten thousand generations, the moon shines upon the spring terrace.
Merciful light universally illuminates all heavenly beings,
Subtly entering the tiniest dust to fill heaven and earth.
My life shares the same body as heaven and earth,
Just like Literary Flourishing at the beginning of kalpas.
The sacred is not sacred of itself, nor the ordinary ordinary of itself—
Only after drifting to this day do we awaken.
May we encounter the teaching of the Seven-Curved Merciful Venerable,
Devoted to loyalty, to filial piety, to a merciful heart.
Not with verbal karma to scorn gods and humans,
Not with bodily karma to burden parents,
Not with mental karma to deceive heaven and earth,
Not with heart karma to bring calamity upon descendants.
May we follow filial conduct and hidden merit,
Practicing all manner of skillful means in every direction.
Repenting and redeeming the stains of many lives’ transgressions,
We take refuge in the primordial sovereign’s great merciful light.
Seeking descendants, seeking emolument, seeking the means of life—
We seek not from others but from ourselves.
Only our teacher, Literary Flourishing of the Seven Curves,
Through kalpas awaits others with the law of forbearance.
May you release a single wish-fulfilling light,
Compassionately mindful of all beings in true repentance.

Repentance now complete, we proceed to make vows:
May parents together attain the fruit of longevity,
Tortoise years and crane hair reflecting merciful light.
May I myself bow to great good fortune,
Honoring those above and nurturing those below without suffering.
May descendants inhale the osmanthus of clouded cliffs,
Flourishing together with me in fine splendor.
Father’s kindness and children’s filial piety bring spring to the whole family,
Brightness unbetraying the Merciful Venerable’s teaching.
May we receive the Seven-Curved One’s personal guidance,
Pointing the way to ascend as immortals and enter the Dao’s gate.
Abandoning life and receiving life, perfectly and universally knowing,
May all be fulfilled through endless future kalpas.

Vows now complete, we proceed to praise:
Within the osmanthus-scented palace, host of benevolence and filial piety,
Your teaching rain flows everywhere, washing away karmic roots.
Karmic roots transform into osmanthus blossoms’ fragrance,
Good roots planted to bear the fruit of longevity.
One family’s flesh and blood without affliction,
Seven-Curved descendants together protecting and sustaining.
Universally vowing for this life and the next,
Before the Purple Cloud Cliff, attaining the Dao’s fruit.
Step by step, heart by heart, at the Emperor’s side,
Life after life, the heavens ordain.
Though bones may be ordinary and the body reduced to ashes,
A single point of true heart is naturally like metal and stone.

The Master of Gan Mountain’s Mowei Grotto, Supreme and Unsurpassed True Lord of Highest Virtue, Rectifies the Mysterious Storehouse Incantation:

The Primordial qi of the Mysterious Origin divides,
Pure radiance opens the grotto’s spirits.
A numinous wind revolves the Great Harmony,
Jade tones gather the flowing essence.
Supreme is this, fundamentally natural—
Who recognizes this mysterious text?
Firm and resolute, illumined in singular awakening,
In an instant one transcends the Three Vehicles.
Still and silent, without root of form,
Through kalpas eternal, how could one drift or sink?
Who can refine and uphold this practice?
Ultimately, one ascends to Jade Clarity.

The Dao speaks: In the primordial Dragon Han kalpa, the Celestial King of the Origin of Origins revealed *The Jade Sutra of the Great Grotto* within the Highest and Vast Jade Clarity Palace. He expounded the Dao of the Supreme Mystery and the Mystery of Mysteries, naming it *The Great Grotto Sutra of the Immortals*. The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins first intoned the Supreme Mystery in a single sound, its resonance flowing through Jade Clarity. He propagated the Imperial Singular True Dao, proclaimed the precious texts of the Great Grotto, demonstrated the methods of the Nine Governances, and transmitted the talismans of the Nine Lights. When scholars recite these, upon purifying themselves and cultivating practice, they immediately gain the joyous celebration of the myriad spirits, the protection of the hundred numina, the resonance of the ten thousand sages, and the presence of the ten thousand immortals. Thereby, one may transcend the Three Calamities and Four Malevolences, the Five Demons and Six Harms, the Seven Injuries and Eight Difficulties, the Nine Adversities and Ten Evils. One ascends as an immortal, enters sagehood, and the spirit is born in Purple Tenuity. Naturally and effortlessly, one is unbound by the constraints of yin and yang, the Five Phases, or the Six qi. With each thought, one grows, hastening toward the Great Vehicle, propagating it endlessly. The myriad heavens below observe, and the Jade Emperor descends his gaze. Flying immortals safeguard and welcome one’s ancestors through kalpas past, their ethereal souls and wandering spirits all attaining rebirth. Lineages connect with immortals, becoming eternally noble. When merit is fulfilled and the Dao perfected, flesh and bone ascend together, riding dragons and driving clouds to ascend and pay homage in Jade Clarity.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins, whistling and chanting the Supreme Mystery, concentrated his spirit in distant contemplation and proclaimed the Grotto’s chapters:

Supreme Grotto of the Origin,
The Origin gives birth to the Nine Heavens.
The Ancestor of qi is the Supreme Nonbeing,
The lineage of wind inherits the Mystery.
The Mystery’s transmission once severed,
The Four Clarities soothed and pacified.
The Imperial Singular’s Upper Radiance,
Linked with the multitudes, gathers the mists.
Long bound to the singular destiny,
Seven generations cast into tranquility.
Entrusting the numinous, attaching to life,
Returning to the splendor of the natural.
Vast and distant, flowing radiance,
The Six Luminaries sink and shift.
Ascending the model, wielding brilliance,
Western Florescence manifests peace.
All inscribed in the Imperial Registers,
Fully attaining liberation at the source.
The Womb Field’s profound path,
Generations bring forth jade orchids.
Numinous light of eightfold radiance,
Intermingling births the myriad spirits.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Jade Emptiness follows the Mystery in return,
Roaming the Golden Dawn of the Celestial Morn.
Brightly shines the Imperial Radiance,
Suddenly one feasts on Jade Isle.
To the left, the Beginning Youth is gathered,
To the right, the Eternal Talisman is summoned.
Illuminating the true, resplendent in the Nine Heavens,
Three suns reflect the unfolding Mystery.
The Dry Radiance joins the Three Collars,
Within lies the profound and boundless void.
Grant me long years,
A thousand kalpas mark but one cycle.
The Yellow Register guards virtue’s measure,
Donning brocade, one enters the divine mounds.
The Supreme Singular attends to the root of life,
The Duke’s son summons the united talisman.
Ten revolutions fulfill the initial resolve,
Attaining entry into the root of great faith.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Jade Emperor’s Mysterious Upper Banner,
Commands the steps of the Nine Heavens.
The Seven Awakenings complete the Dao’s reckoning,
Joyous and harmonious, the divine wind returns.
The whirlwind gleams, halting in Northern Florescence,
Purple blossoms sing in Eastern Jasper.
Jade harmony beyond the Nine Heavens,
The Jade Talisman summons Supreme Tenuity.
The Three Pristines give birth in the Mud Pill,
Radiating the golden numinous brilliance.
The Venerable Lord firmly upholds the summit,
Guarding the mechanism of life and death’s fidelity.
The Ten Virtues arise within the Mystery,
Transcending adversity, naturally.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Supreme Darkness severs the Nine Mysteries,
The Grotto’s radiance entrusts divine communion.
The Jade Emperor rides the Vermilion Dawn,
Green auroras illumine the golden ramparts.
The Upper Palace within the cloud’s pearls,

The Numinous Pass beneath the Great Desert,
Mists and foam surge into the void.
The Dark Transformation blends Kan and Li,
The Mysterious of Mysteries, the Young Fire King.
Rare stillness, lofty and co-arising,
The Boundless protects the Valley Youth.
The Round Way knows no stagnation,
Wondrous union possesses nine layers.
To the south, the roots of seven ancestors are untied,
To the west, the misfortunes of accumulated kalpas are dissolved.
The body transcends the myriad tidal waves,
The spirit gathers the ten directions.
Great return reverses the Womb Chariot,
The Three Unions ride the Celestial Dragon.

The Palace of the Celestial Emperor of Supreme Tenuity,

The Divine Clan governs the numinous heart,

The Golden Chamber dense with bright auroras,
Nine gates gleam with lofty jasper.
The Yellow Court traverses Northern Origin,
The Origin Father turns left in radiance.
Vermilion crystal awakens the Illuminating Master,
The profound and boundless ascends Upper Clarity.
The Four Mysteries hold the Origin’s prohibitions,
Eternally safeguarding the Five Emperor Cities.

The Cavern’s clarity shines with pure luminous light,

Future lives and others’ minds,

The Cavern’s source and the Cavern’s clarity,
The ten thousand Dao arise from penetrating life.

Root and dust wholly dissolve,
Being and nonbeing all become empty void.
The wondrous practice perfects the True One,
Named as the great heart’s numinous penetration.
The Dao complete, one ascends Jade Clarity,
Attaining the rank of Sage Immortal Elder.

The Primordial Beginning bestows the Great Mystery,
The Azure Barbarian presents the precious pearl.
The sandalwood’s blazing melody is wondrous,
Its subtle sound pervades the Great Void.
The Nine August Ones’ Upper Perfected qi,
The Four Directors’ Great Immortal Kings.
Flying auroras scatter the sun of heaven,

The Cinnabar Mother and Golden Perfected Yang.

The Dao speaks: At that time, the Celestial King of the Origin of Origins, with the qi of the Highest Cavern’s Primordial Chaos, the Great Nonbeing, the Primordial Heaven’s Treasure, and the Jade Emperor, coalesced a precious pearl, naming it the Azure Barbarian, saying: “I, with this precious pearl, follow the Dao’s wondrous unity, benevolently bestowing the root of life, gestating the mysterious and dividing the primordial, giving birth to the beginning and transmitting the Perfected, transforming and generating the various heavens, congealing into the ten thousand qi. Now, for the Jade Palace Dao Lord, this treasure is reissued. The Celestial Emperor Kings and Heavenly Perfected Great Sages gaze upon the treasure’s radiance, its light spreading into hundreds of thousands of myriads of millions, coalescing into the *Wondrous Script of the Great Cavern*’s jade writ, congealing into clouds, shimmering into chapters. The Celestial Emperor Kings and Heavenly Perfected Great Sages, with pure luminous discernment, with primal penetrating vision, with flowery tongues’ penetration, in unison intone the Great Cavern’s cloud chapters. Their resonance pervades the ten thousand heavens, their echoes flow through the nine earths. Heavenly realms, earthly realms, water realms, and divine lands—all spirits and numina, not leaving their original seats, together behold the cloud chapters, their eyes dazzled by immortal Sanskrit, their ears all attaining comprehension. A hundred lifetimes’ obstructions extinguished, ten thousand kalpas’ dust dissolved. The Three Paths and Nine Dark Realms, the ten directions’ evil destinies, all receive the light and sound. Wherever it reaches, the ten fetters, nine knots, six defilements, and seven dusts—in this instant, all simultaneously attain liberation.

At that time, the Great Mystery Dao Father approached the Xiao Terrace, prostrating twice and bowing his head, seeking to receive the precious pearl’s coalesced *Wondrous Script of the Great Cavern*’s jade writ and cloud chapters, hoping thereby to guide and transform the beings of heaven and humanity, all to avoid the ten thousand disasters, all to dissolve the multitude of sins, not to sink into evil destinies, all to attain the One Vehicle. Vastly nurturing this vow, he earnestly entreated.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins commanded the Perfected Jade Palace Dao Lord, the Great Sage of the Primordial Spirit, to assume the proper dignified deportment, and personally bestowed the Azure Barbarian Pearl upon the Great Mystery Dao Father.

The Heavenly August Ones’ Upper Perfected qi,
The Three Origins ride the morning’s return.
The Dharma Enclosure arises in Vermilion Empyrean,
The Imperial Crystals open the Jade Gates.
Extricating corpses from the Gate of Life,
Unbinding knots on the Peach Health Stair.
Gathering spirits to preserve the Five Registers,
Revolving to ascend into the Great Tenuity.
Alone entering yet doubly cultivating,
A single melody opens the water and heaven.
The sea’s sun rises naturally from the east,
The primordial life generates the Great Beginning.

The Great One generates the primordial qi,
The child who governs life within the sun.
Resplendent with numinous radiant light,
Donning auroras to ascend the Imperial Ramparts.
Seated in array upon the Thunder Spirit’s mat,
Merging within the Five Suns’ Chamber.
White qi nurtures Upper Life,
The Azure Lord secures prolonged prosperity.
Left, grasping the Gate of Essence Above,
Right, embracing the Infant of Union and Harmony.

Attaining the rank of Upper Clarity Lord.

The body attains to ride the spirit wind.

Harmoniously returning as an infant child.
The Great Beginning’s three qi cycle,
The Perfected Writ inaugurates luminous life.

To the left, the Firm Jade Lord,

Presenting tallies to enter the Jade Palace.

Revolving the primordial to await the Ten Penetrations.

Immortal officials bind ghostly essences.

Scattering blossoms upon the Jade Clarity Terrace.

One revolution and the host of Perfected arrive.
Fragrant winds fan the Three Treasures,
The Five Viscera reflect the Clear Tranquility.
The Azure Hu’s luminous splendor,
The Sandalwood’s blazing auspicious hook.
The Great Centrality’s Six Qi purify,
The Winding Waters embrace the Celestial River.
The Six Perfections’ merit is perfected,
The Five Demons fell the Six Yin.

Preserving life within the Great Rosy Cloud Palace,
Arraying guests in the Upper Clarity’s hostel.
The Gate of Destiny joins with essence to extend,

The Purple Blossom leads the Womb Immortals,
The Origin’s Mandate as the Perfected within the Perfected.

Within the Golden Watchtower the Supreme Radiance qi,
The Ten Directions glow with purple mist.
The Three Mandates of the Great One Emperor,
Five summonses to the Great Peace spirits.
Seven revolutions beckon the Peak Perfected,
Jade talismans announce to the Three Bureaus.
Extracting the registers from beneath the Three Numinous,

The Supreme Emperor of the Eight Numinous,

The Peach Lord guards the Six Harmonies,
Inscribing essence to defend the Muddy Pellet.
The Supreme Clarity’s Eightfold Radiance observes,

The Origin’s Mandate arises naturally.

Ninefold clouds seal the layered gates,

The Eight Perfected join with the Radiance Lord,

Nine transformations return to attain the Seven.

The Muddy Pellet’s distinctions are easily made.
The Great Perfected’s Ninefold Light Wheel,
The Ten Companions knot the Writ’s patterns.
Preserving the child’s Origin qi flows,
The Five qi govern the Central Prowess.
Merging as one to return to the Emperor’s watchtower,
Eternal longevity without end or kalpa.
Transforming to soar through the Upper Clarity,
Surpassing the Three Thousand Practices.

Above the Great Mystery’s Nine qi,
Mists swirl amidst the Great Radiance.
Divine light blooms upon the empty peaks,
The Five Paths illumine the Three Heavens.
Mounting the radiance to ascend the Absolute Empyrean,
Riding the winds to dispel stagnant spirits.
Within the center a single sun revolves the pearl,
Governing the heart to enter tranquil leisure.
Merging within the Three and Five Palaces,
Layered transformations through myriad eons.
Felling the womb’s tree at its root,
Forever severing the blood corpse’s source.
Seven ancestors disperse accumulated stagnation,
Returning blossoms to the Dark Mystery’s depths.
Myriad qi generate myriad spirits,
All immortals become Immortal Kings.
The Great Mystery initiates the Ten Clarities,
Wondrous practices ascend the Ten Perfected.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Beyond the Upper Clarity’s Absolute Rosy Clouds,
The Eight Emperors revolve the Nine Heavens.
From the profound and boundless arises the Emperor’s abode,
Bearing these Radiance-dwelling persons.
At dawn ascending the Supreme Elder’s chamber,
At dusk feasting in the Golden Blossom Pavilion.
Feathered tablets command the Great One,

Felling the womb tree’s root.
Untying the knots of the seven ancestors,
Dispersing calamities to pacify the Nine Mysteries.

Reviewing immortals to ascend Fusang.

Preserving the talisman within the Muddy Pellet,
Guarding the spirit named Peach Prosperity.

The Seven Mysteries ascend the Vermilion Chamber,
The omen’s body meets in the Jade Hall.

Returning to infancy as the Origin’s Mandate Child,
The Sandalwood blazes with the Auspicious Hook.
The Celestial One’s Origin Root Immortal,
Free within the Wheel of Luminous Radiance.

High immortals conceal the Emperor’s scriptures.
The Chart governs the Nine Heavens’ exterior,
Penetrating observation arises from Non-Being.

The Five Peaks come once to the court.
The Three Bureaus beckon the host of demons,

Recording immortality in the Upper Clarity’s annals.

The Feathered Radiance’s Supreme Non-Being court.

Seven rosy clouds descend upon the Perfect Clarity.

The Brahmanic Prosperity aids the Yellow Tranquility.
The Five Elders wave the crimson blossoms,
Scattering fragrance to bear the Jade Numinous.
Golden substance washes in the Emperor’s river,
Green mists luxuriate with flowing jade.
Divine extraction of the Three Paths’ accumulations,
Immortal embryo knits the omen’s form.

The Supreme Clarity Jade Emperor’s Master, the Great Dao Lord of the Jade Heaven,
With the vermilion palace’s heart-spirit, soars to the Venerable One of the Grand Mystery.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Three Perfected give birth to the Grand Prime,
Jade portals reflect the dawn’s radiance.
The Grand Simplicity penetrates the primal void,
Cinnabar groves bristle with crimson branches.
Returning spirit to the ninefold palace,
The Southern Prosperity emits jade blossoms.
A hundred meridians receive the fluid elixir,
The Dark Mystery rests in the Three Effulgences’ vale.
The omen-body ascends to Jade Clarity,
Seven ancestors depart the gloomy prison.
Long preserved beyond the kalpa’s end,
For myriad ages they become the immortals’ lineage.
Enthroned as the sagely lineage’s sovereign,
The Jade Clarity’s Grand Cavern spirit.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Western Prime’s ninefold numinous qi,
Golden elixir flows through the cloud palace.
Above, the supreme jade brilliance transcribes,
Radiant scenes within the Grand Rosy Clouds.
Moving, it revolves the nine heavens’ wheel,
Still, it sinks the eight currents’ net.
Within the chamber dwells the Embryo Immortal Mother,
Who bears the lapels of the Grand Thearch.
The Mysterious Unity’s spirit arises in time,
The Three Elders spread the plain white canopy.
Left hand grasps the omen’s talismanic register,
Right hand carries the governance of the divine lineage.
Together they ascend the numinous dragon’s gate,
Bowing heads in the Jade Clarity’s chamber.
Uprooting the roots of death and extinction,
Nurturing form within the Three and Five.
Seven ancestors dissolve the corpse’s knots,
Receiving blessings from the luminous pearl’s realm.
Above, they attest to the sagely sovereign within,
Talisman-transformed into the Primordial Qi’s king.

The Great Dao Lord of the Jade Heaven says:
My master, the Celestial King of the Origin of Origins, bestowed upon me this *Grand Cavern Sutra of the Immortals*. Its purport is profound and recondite, the wondrous gate of cultivating truth.

First, stabilize the regulated breath—
A thousand harmonies of Grand Harmony.
Midway, contemplate the transformation into truth,
Dissolving forms to disperse dust.
Five thousand primal unities converge,
Sitting in presence, standing in absence.
Grand stabilization perfects truth,
Wondrous practice connects with the numinous.

First is the circulation of qi,
Next is the circulation of spirit,
Finally, the circulation of the numinous.
Ten circulations complete the truth,
The Dao perfected, ascending to the celestial court,
Transcending and soaring beyond,
Passing through the Three Realms,
Coming and going within the Three Clarities,
Attaining the rank of Grand Cavern,
Heavenly One, Thearchic Sovereign.
Six perfections, ten circulations,
Myriad practices perfected,
A thousand harmonies, myriad unions,
Naturally attaining the supreme.

Thus concludes the fifth scroll of the *Grand Cavern Sutra of the Supreme Vastness, the All-True Wenchang*.

chunks.original_text: 太上无极总真文昌大洞仙经 经名：太上无极总真文昌大洞仙经。 原题甘山摩维洞主校正。 据序文称，乃南宋乾道戊子文昌君降授道士刘安胜，景定甲子秋道士罗懿子重校正。 岁在摄提格绣梓宣行。 系模仿《上清大洞经》及《灵宝度人经》编造。 五卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部本文类。 太上无极总真文昌大洞仙经卷一 九天开化主宰澄真正观宝光慈应更生永命天尊序 甘山摩维洞主太玄无上上德真君校正 予之居事畎浍，忽於锄下得一金像，询之父老，曰乃元始天王相。 昔夏禹理水，冶金为像，以镇方岳，予香火奉祀，未尝少懈，因海风翻浪，人力不可支，予为众舍金像投骇浪中，由是风潮遂回，一境获安。 思忆之久，一夕沙碛中有光亘天，掘之，再得旧像，归筑宫安奉，同邦人共事之，积年灵感，不可胜纪。 予考妣不幸死於瘟疫，予葬庐墓，培壅周隅，有三神人乃真定光，郁罗翘、光妙音三真人葛巾羽褐芒鞋访予，以《大洞经》一帙赐予，曰晨夕诵之，必获善果，於三才中，上可以资奉父母祖族魂灵，出离幽苦，中可以灭罪消灾，延年益福，下可以庇族救人同获保全，汝可舍金宝拜吾三人，吾为奏传。 予即日依命设斋，贡金缯，奉师受之。 尔后晨夕持诵不最辍，屡获灵感，因盛暑洪水奫浸考妣坟墓，予礼奉金像，诵《大洞经》，期以千卷为终，以保无虞。 次年秋雨霖霪，傍溪涌涨，数流为一，予益恐，及水落视之，则坟前溪谷变成坚埇，广一里余，自是松楸无害。 予尝思父母死於疫疾，恨瘟鬼之害，切骨为雠，幽明路殊，力不能报，每旦夕勤诵《大洞仙经》，虔恳金像，愿赐威力，以治瘟鬼。 又三年，忽梦金像语予曰：《大洞仙经》汝熟记矣，《大洞法箓》尔未见也，今当授汝，以治邪魔，非惟可以契汝初心，亦可以佐天行化，助国救民也。 袖中出书二件，予百拜受之。 一曰《大洞箓》，二曰《大洞法》。 既觉，此二书在枕前，因设斋置匦收贮，择日出而阅之。 读至大洞天驺甲卒一万人下度之句，忽风雷昼暝，金甲朱绶者无数，列於予前，俯而请命。 一人执红旗立於众先，曰：愿听使令。 予方恍惚，不觉厉声谓之曰：吾要汝等往治瘟鬼，此乡某家合门病瘟，为吾驱来！ 语毕，一持旗者，领百余人入其家，俄顷执鬼使五人而出，有蒙虎皮者，冠鸡雄者，貌若人者，若乌鸦者，若驴马者，所执皆水火羽翣凿之具。 予怒而叱之，将灭其形，彼乃词曰：弟子等岁运所生，岁炁所成，所游有方，所病有人，阴谴至者受其灾，天命绝者致其死，亦非弟子所敢私行。 始自三官五岳上奏玉帝，呈世人罪状，由是帝命行下三官五岳行病，年王案分给牒分遣，某等一依定籍施行，若蒙真官赐以宽贷，自后愿遵约束，遇有行瘟，见真官符箓所在，即不至矣。 予因依经法授以教法而去，闾里病瘟者，予与之符法，皆得全活，予因以此法箓救人病疾众矣，名闻远方，士庶官吏踵门求治者，不可计数。 予积玄功妙行，皆由持诵此《大洞仙经》，而获《大洞法箓》，故能全收神效，立正除邪，济生度死，消灾延寿。 其后冥冥中有大力鬼神、社庙英爽来求予诵经回施者，皆谢云：乘真官经力、增助威德迁神善籍矣。

**The Supreme Vast Boundless Primordial Perfected Wenchang Great Cavern Immortal Scripture**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Vast Boundless Primordial Perfected Wenchang Great Cavern Immortal Scripture*. Originally collated by the Master of Moyi Cave of Ganshan. According to the preface, it was transmitted by Lord Wenchang to the Daoist Liu Ansheng in the *wuzi* year of the Qiandao reign of the Southern Song, and later recollated by the Daoist Luo Yizi in the autumn of the *jiazi* year of the Jingding reign. Printed and disseminated in the year of *shetige*.

This text was modeled after the *Highest Clarity Great Cavern Scripture* and the *Numinous Treasure Scripture of Salvation for Humanity*. Five scrolls in total. Base text from the *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Cavern Reality Division*, *Original Texts* category.

---

**The Supreme Vast Boundless Primordial Perfected Wenchang Great Cavern Immortal Scripture, Scroll One**

**Preface by the Celestial Worthy of the Nine Heavens’ Transformative Governance, Clarity and True Contemplation, Treasure Radiance, Compassionate Response, and Eternal Life**

Collated by the Supreme Mystery and Unsurpassed Highest Virtue Perfected Lord, Master of Moyi Cave of Ganshan

I once lived as a farmer, and while tilling the fields, I unearthed a golden statue beneath my hoe. Upon inquiring with the village elders, I was told it was an image of the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning. Long ago, when Yu the Great governed the waters, he smelted metal to fashion this statue to pacify the sacred peaks. I had worshipped it with incense and offerings without the slightest negligence. Yet when a sea storm churned the waves beyond human strength to withstand, I, on behalf of the people, cast the golden statue into the raging waters. Thereupon, the winds and tides receded, and the entire region found peace.

I had long pondered this event when one evening, a radiance stretched across the sky above the sandy shoals. Digging there, I recovered the original statue and returned it to build a temple for its enshrinement. The people of the region joined me in its veneration, and over the years, its numinous responses became too numerous to record.

My parents, alas, perished in a pestilence. I built a hut beside their graves, tending the earth around them. Then, three divine beings—Perfected Zhen Dingguang, Yu Luoqiao, and Guang Miaoyin—appeared before me, clad in hempen headscarves, feathered robes, and straw sandals. They bestowed upon me a volume of the *Great Cavern Scripture*, saying: "Recite this morning and evening, and you shall surely attain good fruits. Among the Three Powers, above, it may aid the souls of your parents and ancestors, liberating them from dark suffering; in the middle, it may eradicate sins, dispel calamities, prolong life, and augment blessings; below, it may protect your clan and save others, ensuring their preservation. You may offer gold and silk to us three, and we shall memorialize your devotion."

That very day, I followed their command, preparing a vegetarian feast and presenting gold and silks to receive their teachings. Thereafter, I recited the scripture morning and night without cease, and its numinous responses were manifold. Once, during a scorching summer, a great flood submerged my parents’ graves. I reverently presented the golden statue and recited the *Great Cavern Scripture*, vowing to complete a thousand recitations to ensure their safety. The following autumn, incessant rains swelled the streams into a single torrent, and my fear grew. Yet when the waters receded, I saw that the valley before the graves had transformed into a vast, solid plain, over a *li* in breadth. From then on, the pines and catalpas remained unharmed.

I had long grieved that my parents died of pestilence, hating the plague demons with a bone-deep enmity. Though the paths of the living and the dead diverge, I lacked the power to exact vengeance. Thus, I diligently recited the *Great Cavern Immortal Scripture* morning and evening, entreating the golden statue with utmost sincerity, praying for the might to subdue the plague demons.

Three years later, I suddenly dreamed that the golden statue spoke to me: "You have mastered the *Great Cavern Immortal Scripture*, but you have not yet seen the *Great Cavern Register of Methods*. Artisans, merchants, farmers, and all four classes,

Treasuries overflow with wealth and resources,

Earth deities, shrine spirits, and all numinous beings,

**Dispelling Pestilence**
When the Year-Star governs the Five Pestilences,
Plagues spread through towns and villages, harming the people.
To protect neighborhoods from contagion,
Maintain strict purity and study the *Great Cavern Scripture* together.

**Curing Illness**
When monthly afflictions and yearly calamities linger in the body,
One seeks physicians, divination, and gods in vain.
With no means of relief and nowhere to turn,
Entrust your fate to the Dao and take refuge in the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Delivering Sunken Souls and Stagnant Spirits**
The six kinds of karmic souls—men and women—
Dwell in darkness, bound to the shadowy underworld.
To universally proclaim their deliverance to the celestial realms,
Frequently study the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Untangling Karmic Grievances**
The six paths of karmic foes weave deep entanglements,
Vengeance upon vengeance—when will it end?
To bring joy to each and all,
There is nothing but listening to the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Ending Curses**
Whether over wealth or wrath,
A moment’s fury invokes the gods.
When ghostly lawsuits form, when will they cease?
Only the *Great Cavern Scripture* can dissolve them.

**Quelling Calamities**
Illness, death, and misfortune cling to the body,
Official disasters and bandits bring bitter oppression.
Wealth scatters like melting ice—
For protection, hold fast to the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Eradicating Demonic Beings**
Spirits of trees, stones, foxes, monkeys, and dogs,
Hurl bricks, set fires, and take human form.
They wield power, demand lewd sacrifices—
To exterminate them, study the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Opening the Mind and Sharpening Wisdom**
Scholars and students with minds choked by weeds,
Child prodigies who falter in response—
To wield the brush with divine aid,
First cultivate the habit of holding the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Preserving Form and Life**
This body is like illusion, like a bubble,
Yet within its qi and spirit lies the path to true cultivation.
To preserve form and life, aligning with Heaven,
Diligently ponder the *Great Cavern Scripture* of Wenchang.

**Admonishing the Wealthy**
Do not rely on vast wealth amassed at home,
For Heaven’s decree can strip your fortune and topple your prosperity.
When the time is ripe to cultivate merit,

With a heart of sincerity reaching the Supreme Clarity,
One receives transmission from the Three Spirits.
This body attains the fruit of Heavenly Worthies—
All because of diligent study of the *Great Cavern Scripture*.

**Two Universal Exhortations**
Hear my earnest words on the *Great Cavern Scripture*,
Its profound mysteries truly beyond naming.
Its boundless merits defy thought—
I urge all mortals not to take it lightly.

The Primordial Heavenly King expounded the Great Vehicle,
Only those with karmic affinity encounter this sacred scripture.
If one can study and recite it steadfastly to the end,
They shall join the assembly of Wenchang.

Its single sound resounded for all to hear.
The lamp of Dharma was passed on by later generations—
Not only by Heavenly Worthies and Dao Lords.

When the divine wind is still and the sea cloudless,
Heaven and earth are serene, the four qi pure.
If even one karmic thread stirs in delusion,
The celestial pivot turns once more without cease.

On auspicious days and favorable hours, recite the scripture well,
Let not worldly cares entangle the mind.
When the work of aiding people and benefiting creatures is complete,
Your name shall be inscribed on jade tablets and golden registers.

Neither existent nor nonexistent, originally pure,
Beyond form, beyond sound, transcending all comparison.
Where depiction and description fail to reach,
The subtle image within the Mystery is most distinct.

The highest true beings, devoid of qi,
Have endured from the Dragon Han era to the present.
Unchanging, unaugmented, they are quiescence itself—
This is called the Great Dharma Body.

Contemplate the talismanic decree—it proclaims itself,
Able to release those bound in dark prisons of suffering.
Returning to the origin, restoring the primordial, it revives life,
So that all may ascend at every moment.

Impurities arise from the mind’s obscurity,
The three paths and five sufferings burden form and soul.
When the light of Heaven washes away the roots and dust,
Immortal transformation dawns as one bows to the Supreme.

Gradually entering non-action, attaining the Dao’s essence,
Not a speck of dust clings, the mind is perfectly attuned.
Glancing back at the three thousand realms below,
All dharmas dissolve into emptiness.

The Great Dharma Body, formless and traceless,
Neither born nor destroyed, is called the Perfected True One.
Though countless kalpas of stone wear away,
Its tranquil divine radiance remains ever bright.

After traversing the arduous roads of life’s passes,
This time, joy comes with one’s name on the golden tablet.
Who can restrain the aspirations of a true man?
Returning in glory, one rides freely like a team of four horses.

To study the Dao, rely on abundant wisdom,
Lest the clear river swell with wind and waves.
Melt the heart and enter beyond the cinnabar clouds—
What can the spears and halberds of the world do to me?

**Preface to the *Scripture of Transformative Enlightenment from the Nine Heavens***
Composed by the Perfected Lord of Merit-Gathering at the Northern Bureau

This scripture was proclaimed by the Golden Mouth of the Most High,
Solely to save beings in the final kalpa.
Upon concluding the discourse, it was entrusted by jade decree
To be stored in the Jade Palace’s inner sanctum.

A command was issued to all heavens to propagate its teachings,
And all Perfected Ones to transmit it accordingly.
Thus, it was transmitted and descended to eight altars,
Yet only Shaoxi’s numinous response saw it gathered and printed,
While others merely copied and recited it.

The people of Dingzhou excel in goodness beyond other prefectures,
And the transformative enlightenment of the Great Emperor is most profound in this land.
My own incense offerings have continued for over a decade,
Unmixed and unwavering from beginning to end.
Only Wenchang’s numinous response has been particularly commendable here, descending to transmit it.

Moreover, I urge the faithful to carve blocks and print it for distribution—
Now, fortunately, the task is complete.

Alas!

chunks.original_text: 凡显名青编而受此经者，岂非欲生之徒，求免兵戈疫疠之苦者欤！ 予谓受经未善也，必诵之而后可，诵之又未善也，必行之而后可。 行者何？ 孝悌忠顺公恕是也，孝悌忠顺公恕非难，亦惟曰安本分三字而已。 吾言如是，可以消劫，疑之信之，吾何有焉。 持诵礼法 凡诵经，当斋沐，服清净衣，入室焚香，叩齿九通，心拜九天，存想元始天王与诸高真，七曲大帝开化仙官，迂临法会，皆列虚无，然后念咒。 净心口神咒 丹珠口神，吐秽除氛。 舌神正伦，通命养神。 罗千齿神，却邪卫真。 喉神虎贲，伸炁引精。 心神丹元，令我通真。 思神炼液，道炁长存。 急急如律令！ 净身神咒 灵宝天尊，安慰身形。 弟子魂魄，五藏玄冥。 青龙白虎，队仗纷纭。 朱雀玄武，侍卫我真。 急急如律令！ 净三业神咒 身中诸内境，三万六千人。 动作履行藏，前劫并后劫。 愿身常自在，常住三宝中。 当於劫坏时，愿身常不灭。 诵此神咒时，三业悉清净。 解秽神咒 太一之精子，束井之华卯，流灌身体午，荡秽除邪酉，净如明珠子，洁如莲华卯，化金光身午，步云锦霞酉，登七宝殿子，为真仙家午。 急急如九天开化主宰元皇上帝律令！ 净天地神咒 天地混沌，秽气分葩。 洞中虚玄，晃耀太元。 三清玉勑，光映九衢。 八方威神，使我自然。 灵宝符命，普告九天。 乾啰怛那，洞罡太玄。 斩妖缚邪，杀鬼万千。 中山神咒，元始玉文。 持诵一遍，却鬼延年。 按行五岳，八海知闻。 魔王束首，侍卫我轩。 凶秽荡净，道炁常存。 净坛咒 太上说法时，金锺响五音。 百秽藏九地，群魔护骞林。 天华散法雨，法鼓震迷沉。 诸天庆善哉，金童抚瑶琴。 愿倾八霞光，照我皈依心。 早登大法桥，翼侍五云深。 急急如律令！ 安土地咒 元始安镇，普告万灵。 岳渎真官，土地祇灵。 左社右稷，不得妄惊。 回向正道，内外肃清。 各安方位，备守帝庭。 太上有命，搜捕邪精。 护法神王，保卫诵经。 皈依大道，元亨利贞。 急急如律令！ 五星神咒 五星列照，焕明五方。 水生却灾，木德致昌。 荧惑消祸，太白辟兵。 镇星四据，家国利亨。 名刊玉简，字录帝房。 乘飙扇景，飞腾太空。 出入冥无，游宴十方。 五云浮盖，招神摄风。 役使万灵，上卫仙翁。 发炉 无上三天真元始三炁太上老君，召出臣等身中三五功曹、左右官使者、捧香驿龙骑吏、侍香金童、传言散花玉女、五帝直符直日香官，各三十六人出。 默想出者严装关启，此间土地里域真官令臣焚香诵经之所，金童扬姻，灵妃散花，三界真圣交集轩前。 伏愿某诵经之后，真炁周流，上以保全宗社，安奉帝王，禳兵戈水火之灾，除疫病旱蝗之厄； 中以祝延永命，保佑合门消九星八难之迍，免五苦三灾之累； 下以落名黑简，脱籍鬼乡，七祖升仙，先亡证道。 次祈人民异姓，乘经法而万福兴隆，山泽含灵，感圣功而咸超道岸，庶使某疾患不侵，灾殃扫荡，思真慕道，延想丹华，涤虑澄心，以祈轻举，济人利物，立功为先，凡有所祈，克获通感，天上天下，咸丐闻知。 愿得太上十方正真生炁下降，流入臣某身中，令臣所启，速达无极大道三清上圣、昊天玉皇上帝、梓潼神文圣武孝德忠仁王、救劫大慈悲更生永命天尊御前。 集神咒

All who appear in the green registers and receive this scripture—are they not those who seek life and wish to escape the sufferings of war, plague, and pestilence? Yet I say: merely receiving the scripture is not enough; one must recite it to be sufficient. And even reciting it is not enough; one must practice it to be complete.

What is practice? It is filial piety, fraternal duty, loyalty, obedience, impartiality, and forbearance. These are not difficult—they are merely the three words: *abide in one’s proper place*. Such are my words. They can dispel the kalpa’s tribulations. Whether you doubt or believe, what have I to do with it?

**Rites for Recitation**
When reciting the scripture, one must fast and bathe, don fresh and pure garments, enter the chamber, light incense, knock the teeth nine times, and bow in the heart to the Nine Heavens. Visualize the Primordial Heavenly King of the Origin and the host of exalted Perfected Ones, the Seven-Curved Great Emperor of Transformative Enlightenment, and the immortal officials descending to the dharma assembly, all arrayed in the void. Only then recite the incantations.

**Incantation for Purifying Heart and Mouth**
Spirits of the cinnabar pearl mouth, expel filth and disperse miasma.
Spirit of the tongue, rectify order, connect life and nourish the spirit.
Spirits of the thousand teeth, repel evil and guard the true.
Spirit of the throat, fierce as a tiger, extend *qi* and draw forth essence.
Spirit of the heart, cinnabar origin, let me commune with the true.
Contemplate the spirit, refine the fluid—may the Dao’s *qi* endure forever.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!

**Incantation for Purifying the Body**
Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, pacify and comfort this bodily form.
Disciples’ souls and spirits, five viscera in profound darkness,
Azure Dragon and White Tiger, arrayed in splendid ranks,
Vermilion Bird and Dark Warrior, attend and guard my true self.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!

**Incantation for Purifying the Three Karmas**
Within this body’s inner realms, thirty-six thousand beings dwell.
In movement, action, concealment, and retreat—through kalpas past and future—
May this body ever abide in freedom, ever dwell within the Three Treasures.
When the kalpa collapses, may this body never perish.
As this incantation is recited, may the three karmas be wholly purified.

**Incantation for Dispelling Filth**
Essence of the Great One, blossom of the Well Star,
Flowing to bathe the body at noon, sweeping filth and expelling evil at dusk.
Pure as a luminous pearl, immaculate as a lotus blossom,
Transform into a body of golden light, step upon clouds of brocade and rosy dawn,
Ascend the seven-jeweled hall, become a true immortal.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Nine Heavens’ Transformative Sovereign, the Primordial August Emperor commands!

**Incantation for Purifying Heaven and Earth**
Heaven and Earth in primordial chaos, foul *qi* disperses like petals.
Within the cavernous void, radiance illumines the Great Origin.
The Three Clarities’ jade decrees, light shines upon the nine thoroughfares.
Mighty spirits of the eight directions, let me be as nature intends.
Numinous Treasure talismanic command, proclaimed throughout the Nine Heavens.
*Gan luo da na*, penetrating the stellar pivot of the Great Mystery,
Sever demons, bind evil, slay ten thousand ghosts.
Incantation of Mount Zhong, jade script of the Origin.
Recite once to repel ghosts and prolong life,
Pressing forth to the Five Peaks, known to the Eight Seas.
Demon kings bow their heads, attending my chariot.
Malevolence and filth swept clean—may the Dao’s *qi* ever abide.

**Incantation for Purifying the Altar**
When the Most High preached the Dharma, golden bells chimed five notes.
All filth hid in the ninefold earth; demon hordes guarded the *qian* grove.
Heavenly flowers scattered as Dharma rain; Dharma drums shook the deluded from slumber.
All heavens rejoiced—how excellent! Golden youths strummed jade zithers.
May the eight rosy dawns’ radiance pour forth, illuminating my heart of refuge.
Swiftly ascend the great Dharma bridge, soaring to the depths of the five clouds.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!

**Incantation for Pacifying the Local Deity**
The Origin establishes and pacifies, proclaiming to the ten thousand spirits.
True officials of mountains and rivers, numinous deities of the land,
Altars to the left, millet to the right—let none dare recklessly disturb.
Turn toward the true Dao, within and without made solemn and pure.
Each abides in its proper place, guarding the imperial court in readiness.
The Most High has decreed: hunt down and capture demonic essences.
Dharma-protecting divine kings, safeguard the recitation of scriptures.
Take refuge in the Great Dao—*yuan*, *heng*, *li*, *zhen*.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!

**Incantation of the Five Stars**
The Five Stars array their radiance, shining brilliantly in the five directions.
Water engenders and averts disaster; Wood’s virtue brings prosperity.
Mars dissolves calamities; Venus repels warfare.
Saturn stabilizes the four quarters—household and state flourish and prosper.
Names inscribed on jade tablets, characters recorded in the imperial chamber,
Riding the whirlwind, fanning the light, soaring through the great void,
Emerging and entering the unseen, roaming and feasting in the ten directions.
Five-colored clouds float as canopies, summoning spirits and commanding winds,
Commanding the ten thousand spirits, above to protect the immortal elders.

**Opening the Brazier**
Most High True Lord of the Three Heavens’ Primordial Origin, Three *Qi* of the Great Shang, Lord Lao, summon forth the thirty-six officers of the Three and Five Merit Officials within our bodies, the left and right attending envoys, the incense-bearing dragon-riding couriers, the incense-attending Golden Youths, the message-transmitting and flower-scattering Jade Maidens, the Five Thearchs’ direct talismans and daily incense officials—thirty-six each, emerge!

Silently visualize them emerging in solemn attire, opening the gates. Here, on this land’s true officials’ domain, where we burn incense and recite scriptures, Golden Youths waft smoke, numinous consorts scatter flowers, and the true sages of the Three Realms gather before our chariot.

We humbly pray: after reciting this scripture, may true *qi* circulate throughout,
Above, to protect and preserve the ancestral altars, pacify and serve the emperor, dispel disasters of war, water, and fire, and eliminate plagues of pestilence, drought, and locusts;
In the middle, to extend longevity, protect and bless the entire household, dissolve the nine stars’ and eight difficulties’ misfortunes, and free them from the burdens of the five sufferings and three calamities;
Below, to inscribe names in the black ledgers, release them from the ghostly realm, ascend the seven ancestors to immortality, and enable the deceased to attain the Dao.

Next, we pray for the people of different surnames: may they ride the scripture’s Dharma to flourish in ten thousand blessings; for the creatures of mountains and marshes: may they feel the sagely merit and all transcend to the Dao’s shore. May we be spared from illness and calamity, our thoughts ever turned to the true and the Dao, our minds cleansed and hearts stilled, aspiring to ascend lightly. Aiding others and benefiting all beings, establishing merit as the foremost task—whatever we pray for, may it swiftly be granted, known throughout heaven above and earth below.

May the life-*qi* of the Most High’s Ten Directions’ true and upright ones descend, flowing into our bodies, so that our entreaties swiftly reach the boundless Great Dao’s Three Clarities, the August Jade Thearch of the Vast Heaven, the Divine Literary Martial Filial Virtuous Loyal Benevolent King of Zitong, and the Great Merciful Savior of the Kalpa, the Ever-Living Heavenly Worthy of Renewed Life before the throne.

chunks.original_text: 甘山摩维洞主太玄无上上德真君校正 祝香 伏以祥风泽雨，锺灵秀於五香，大德至仁，鉴精诚於一缕，可通无际之际，是名非烟之烟，凭此氤氲，普伸供养，一志惟恭，万神遥鉴。 愿开金钥，仰赞瑶章，伏愿宝光分敷，梵音朗彻，死者受生，生者受度，无愿不成，天之所覆，地之所承，有缘悉证，启请有颂，谨为举扬。 各发无上至诚心，愿入文昌禄嗣会。 皈依三宝诸祖师，惟望慈悲常摄授。 仰启三清境，无上三境尊。 元始大法王，大慈真教主。 玉宸大道君，太玄真道父。 仰启大罗天，无上玄穹主。 仰启三清界，侍宸诸真众。 苍胡颉宝珠，所结大洞经。 妙道难思议，玉章生万神。 大慈元始尊，金像出地户。 化现三神人，葛衣赠金宝。 梦中袖二书，箓法并相授。 变化显文昌，随愿随灵应。 臣今 净三业，永断血尸根。 奉符入玉京，稽首黄金阙。 一心头面礼，元始大法王。 惟愿大慈悲，开受臣所请。 愿臣默想念，合符帝一前。 越度仙黄庭，俱跻大漠外。 七祖断玄滞，受事会玉皇。 愿臣讽诵时，百灵皆会集。 音彻通万天，流响达九地。 成就一切愿，如经所称述。 从此渐进修，成道事诸圣。 经筵诸孝友，金石矢初心。 一礼一称名，皈依七曲主。 注想始青天，先天长寿母。 注想紫云岩，文昌真国土。 后天慈父母，化现桂香宫。 孝子及慈孙，列仙侍慈容。 愿受真信礼，放大如意光。 随心随梦应，嗣禄互储祥。 愿我侍慈亲，生生荣鹤发。 愿我逢圣时，步步荣宠渥。 愿我处生方，随念如意光。 愿我善缘熟，学道早悟真。 愿我业垢空，惟心达净土。 普与人天众，量缘证善果。 金石一真心，真心皈帝君。 诸圣诸天尊，心香同赞祝。 愿与诸经生，一心皈命礼。 至心皈命礼 玉清圣境，清微天宫，郁罗萧台之中，森罗净泓之上，现有为之梵相，具无极之神通，敷演真玄，破无有色空之碍，拯提趣类，绝智愚高下之分，妙用难窥，灵机罔测。 大悲大愿大圣大慈无量度人元始天尊。 至心皈命礼 上清真境，禹余天宫，紫微琼台之中，玄都玉京之上，接元始虚皇之统系，超西那玉国之根苗，入黍米珠，尽挹真玄之精粹，在香林苑，屡谈秘要之筌蹄，妙德难思，神通莫议。 大悲大愿大圣大慈无量度人灵宝天尊。 至心皈命礼 太清仙境，大赤天宫，巍巍金阙之高，渺渺重霄之上，降生於无量数劫 ，说法於万二千天，五千秘言，融三才之妙道，八十余度，接六趣之众生，圣德崇高，玄功广博。 大悲大愿大圣大慈无量度人道德天尊。 至心皈命礼 紫金金阙，白玉玉京，住妙有之境中，处玄真之天上，功成道备，故妙道卓冠於诸天，心广体胖，故慈光遍烛於三界，位尊而上极无上，道妙而玄之又玄，真圣宗师，天人依仗。 大悲大愿大圣大慈穹苍圣主玉皇天尊。 至心皈命礼 股肱佐汉，家世相韩，掉三寸舌而为帝者之师，受一编书而作人中之杰，身不劳於汗马，功已着於丹书，向遇黄石公，即根本神仙之地，后从赤松子，乃飞升大有之庭，眷隆上相之尊严，位正天枢之镇重，启三洞真经之详，演膺九光宝节之荣，褒万古敷扬诸天赞重。 大悲大愿大圣大慈校经主宰 ，道高圣迈上上大德尊天帝法主道君天尊。 至心皈命礼 北上太虚无上常融天、寂虚玄梵境，太乙真庆官、真玄上圣九天游奕使，左领天罡北极右垣大将、太极真宗太玄慈父灵通大妙仙、八威九光圣执乾元帝、心印秉阴灵斗极符、总玄武右弼司判、左领圣府院，誓断妖魔，救护群品，匡扶劫运，统摄万灵，威德无边，神通浩溥，巡游十洞，检察诸天，福佑孝忠，剿除孽害，至圣至神至帅镇天真武治世福神、玉虚师相紫皇天乙真君、玄天仁威清微上帝金阙化身天尊。
