Gan Mountain’s Mowei Cave Master, the Supreme and Unsurpassed Highest Virtue Perfected Lord of the Great Mystery, having collated and rectified, now offers incense.

We bow in reverence, as auspicious winds and nurturing rains gather the numinous essence of the Five Fragrances; as boundless virtue and perfect benevolence witness the sincerity of a single wisp. This may traverse the boundless, called the smoke that is no smoke. Relying on this misty qi, we universally extend our offerings—one mind in utmost reverence, ten thousand spirits gazing from afar.

May the golden key be opened, and the jade scriptures be exalted. We pray that sacred radiance be dispersed, that Brahma’s voice resound clearly; that the dead receive rebirth, that the living attain deliverance; that no wish go unfulfilled. All beneath Heaven’s canopy, all upon Earth’s embrace—those with karmic affinity shall all realize enlightenment.

We now raise our invocation in verse:

Each awakens the utmost sincere heart,
Wishing to enter Wenchang’s Assembly of Fortune and Lineage.
We take refuge in the Three Treasures and all patriarchs,
Hoping only for compassion’s constant embrace.

We look up to the Three Clarities’ realm,
To the supreme lords of the Three Realms.
The Primordial Beginning’s Great Dharma King,
The Most Compassionate True Master of Teachings.

The Jade Emperor’s Great Dao Lord,
Father of the Great Mystery’s True Dao.
We look up to the Great Canopy Heaven,
To the supreme lord of the Mysterious Vault.

We look up to the Three Clarities’ realm,
To the assembled perfected hosts attending the Celestial Throne.
Cang Hu’s precious pearl,
From which the Great Cavern Scriptures were woven.
The wondrous Dao defies thought;
Jade verses give birth to ten thousand spirits.

The Most Compassionate Primordial Beginning Venerable,
Whose golden image emerged from the earth’s portal.
Manifesting as three divine persons,
Who in hempen robes bestowed golden treasures.
In dreams, two scrolls were tucked into sleeves—
Registers and methods both transmitted.
Transformations revealed Wenchang,
Responding to wishes with numinous efficacy.

We now purify the Three Karmas,
Severing forever the roots of blood and corpse.
Bearing the talisman, we enter the Jade Capital,
Kowtowing at the Golden Gate.
With whole heart, we prostrate in homage,
To the Primordial Beginning’s Great Dharma King.
We pray only for great compassion,
To receive our petition.

May our silent contemplation,
Merge with the talisman before the Emperor’s Unity.
Transcending the Yellow Court’s immortal realm,
Together we ascend beyond the Great Wilderness.
May our seven ancestors sever their dark entanglements,
Receiving audience with the Jade Emperor.
When we recite and intone,
May the hundred spirits all assemble.
May the sound penetrate the ten thousand heavens,
Its resonance reaching the nine earths.
May all wishes be fulfilled,
As the scriptures proclaim.
Henceforth, may we gradually cultivate,
Attaining the Dao and serving the sages.

All scripture-assembly’s filial friends,
Pledge their original resolve like metal and stone.
With each bow and each invocation,
We take refuge in the Lord of the Seven Bends.
We visualize the Azure Beginning Heaven,
The Primordial Long-Life Mother.
We visualize the Purple Cloud Crag,
Wenchang’s true land.
The post-celestial compassionate parents,
Manifesting in the Osmanthus Fragrance Palace.
Filial sons and loving grandsons,
Immortals arrayed to attend their compassionate countenance.

We pray to receive the true faith’s rites,
To release the great wish-fulfilling radiance.
Responding to hearts and dreams alike,
Bestowing lineage and storing blessings.
May we serve our compassionate kin,
Lifetimes of honor with crane-plumed hair.
May we encounter sagely times,
Each step graced with abundant favor.
Wherever we dwell in life,
May thoughts summon the wish-fulfilling radiance.
May our good karma ripen,
That we may early awaken to the true Dao.
May our karmic defilements dissolve,
That our minds alone reach the Pure Land.
Universally with all beings of heaven and earth,
May we realize good fruits according to our capacities.

One true heart like metal and stone,
A true heart taking refuge in the Emperor Lord.
All sages and all heavenly venerables,
Together we offer the incense of the heart in praise.
With all scripture students,
We wholeheartedly take refuge and bow in homage.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in homage to:
The Jade Clarity’s sacred realm, the Clear and Subtle Heavenly Palace, amidst the Yu Luo Xiao Terrace, above the Sen Luo Pure Abyss—manifesting a Brahma-like form, possessing boundless divine powers. Expounding the true and mysterious, shattering the obstructions of being and non-being, color and emptiness; delivering all classes of beings, erasing distinctions of wisdom and folly, high and low. Its wondrous workings defy fathoming, its numinous mechanism beyond measure.

The Great Compassionate, Great Vow-Making, Great Sage, Greatly Merciful, Boundlessly Delivering Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in homage to:
The Highest Clarity’s true realm, the Yu Yu Heavenly Palace, amidst the Purple Tenuity’s Jade Terrace, above the Mysterious Capital’s Jade Capital—continuing the lineage of the Primordial Beginning’s Void Sovereign, surpassing the root and sprout of the Western Na Jade Realm. Entering the millet-like pearl, fully drawing the essence of the true and mysterious; dwelling in the Fragrant Grove Garden, repeatedly discoursing on the secret essentials’ fish-traps and rabbit-snares. Its wondrous virtue defies thought, its divine powers defy discussion.

The Great Compassionate, Great Vow-Making, Great Sage, Greatly Merciful, Boundlessly Delivering Numinous Treasure Heavenly Venerable.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in homage to:
The Grand Clarity’s immortal realm, the Great Crimson Heavenly Palace, towering high in the Golden Gate, far above the layered clouds—incarnated through countless kalpas, expounding the Dharma to the twelve thousand heavens. Five thousand secret words, fusing the wondrous Dao of the Three Powers; over eighty salvific methods, receiving the beings of the Six Destinies. Its sagely virtue lofty, its mysterious merit vast.

The Great Compassionate, Great Vow-Making, Great Sage, Greatly Merciful, Boundlessly Delivering Dao and Virtue Heavenly Venerable.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in homage to:
The Purple Gold’s Golden Gate, the White Jade’s Jade Capital—dwelling in the realm of wondrous being, abiding in the Heaven of Mysterious Truth. Having perfected merit and completed the Dao, thus the wondrous Dao stands preeminent among all heavens; with a broad mind and expansive body, thus compassion’s light universally illumines the Three Realms. In rank, supreme and unsurpassed; in Dao, mysterious and ever more mysterious. The true sage, patriarch, and master—on whom heaven and humanity rely.

The Great Compassionate, Great Vow-Making, Great Sage, Greatly Merciful, Vaulted Heaven’s Sacred Lord Jade Emperor Heavenly Venerable.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in homage to:
The Han dynasty’s stalwart minister, whose family served the Han for generations—wielding a three-inch tongue to become the emperor’s teacher, receiving a single scroll to become humanity’s paragon. His body never toiled in military campaigns, yet his merit was recorded in the Vermilion Registers. Formerly encountering the Yellow Stone Elder, he rooted himself in the land of divine immortals; later following Red Pine Master, he ascended to the Great Existence’s court. His favor exalted as the supreme minister, his position steadfast as the Heavenly Pivot’s guardian. He revealed the Three Caverns’ true scriptures in detail, bestowed the glory of the Nine Radiant Precious Nodes. Praised through the ages, extolled by all heavens.

The Great Compassionate, Great Vow-Making, Great Sage, Greatly Merciful, Collator and Lord of Scriptures, the Dao-Sublime and Sage-Surpassing Highest Great Virtue Venerable Heavenly Emperor Dharma Lord Dao Lord Heavenly Venerable.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in homage to:
The Supreme Void of the Northern Ascension, the Ever-Fused Heaven, the Silent Void’s Mysterious Brahma Realm; the Supreme Unity’s True Celebration Palace; the True Mystery’s Highest Sage, the Nine Heavens’ Roaming Ensign; the Great General of the Left-Guarding Celestial Pole’s Right Wall; the Supreme Ultimate’s True Lineage, the Great Mystery’s Compassionate Father, the Numinously Penetrating Great Wondrous Immortal; the Eight Might and Nine Radiance’s Sacred Holder of the Qian Yuan Emperor; the Heart Seal’s Bearer of the Yin Spirit’s Dipper Talisman; the Supreme Dark Warrior’s Right Assistant Controller; the Left-Guarding Sacred Mansion’s Court—who vows to sever demonic forces, to rescue and protect all classes of beings, to uphold the kalpic destiny, to govern the ten thousand spirits. His awe-inspiring virtue boundless, his divine powers vast and pervasive. Patrolling the Ten Caverns, inspecting all heavens; blessing the filial and loyal, exterminating calamitous harms.

The Most Sage, Most Divine, Most Marshal-like, Heaven-Pacifying, World-Blessing True Martial, Jade Void’s Preceptor and Minister, Purple Emperor Heavenly Unity Perfected Lord, Mysterious Heaven’s Benevolent and Majestic Clear and Subtle Supreme Emperor, Golden Gate’s Manifested Heavenly Venerable.

chunks.original_text: 至心皈命礼 甘山福地摩维洞天中，有老人一炁根紫微之应化，上朝金阙九华，通碧落之生芒，说六章经陶凡炼圣之文，赞万寿观复古通今之化，扶持人极，发越地灵，道大难名，功高莫议，大仁大孝大圣大慈储福定命九天丈人、大玄无上上德真君，玄真万福天尊。 至心皈命礼 本来南土，上泝蜀都，先获黄帝九鼎之丹书，后事老君，两度於玉局千轴得修行之要，一时成吐纳之功，法箓全成，受盟威品而结璘诀，正邪两辩，夺福庭治而化咸泉，德就大丹，道齐七政，大悲大愿大圣大慈三天上相玄都丈人、扶教度人天师、正一辅元体道冲玄神化静应显佑真君、六合无穷高明大帝降魔护道天尊。 至心皈命礼 永平柱史，唐代易玄，得异术以全神，脱尘嚣而厌役，主光华之大法，悟万有之真机，遒骨常仙，留马跃入渊之迹，恕心决狱，致鼠飞穿牖之祥，受赤龙丹号碧梧子，大悲大愿大圣大慈、三天次相九炁丈人、丹琳大帝、随机演化天尊。 至心皈命礼 诞生汉室，锡号晋朝，惟布炁以降邪，曾吞虎而救世，管玉霄洞清之法，传玄坛内教之经，掌雷府刑判都督府便宜之事，领天师职升紫微天右相之班，判洞阳宫主混元教，大悲大愿大圣大慈无极真元清皇上帝、九天保册司命天尊。 至心皈命礼 德彰巴峡，迹隐渝江，幼题金榜之姓名，亲授玉阶之冕服，止杀应霜台之梦，现威变日表之容，悟最上乘以劝善，大师而友助，究真常道，假恭天观主，以讲磨膺仁济之褒，嘉表神功之莫测，镇国祚复兴之地，开蜀民再造之天，恩被群生，德隆百世，大悲大愿大圣大慈璧山显应真人清明河童天帝。 至心皈命礼　圣祖母十月初五日诞。 始青天上元命化，初一炁未漓，含七曲真元之粹，九天肇始，包三光精体之全，鸾机无兆朕之可名，鹤质仰清高而莫议，先天先地之慈母，不古不今之婉容，阳回十月五日之春，教演三纲五常之祖，寿绵长寿，形赋元形，载观本行集之跋经，莫测始青天之证道，大悲大愿大圣大慈七曲初劫赋形长生寿母太极元君。 至心皈命礼　圣父二月十一日诞。 桂香宝殿，文昌上宫。 道体混成，含九十余生之化，真元未露，储三万六千之精，开后天不老之鸾书，奉青霄莫测之态梦，神父之大慈父，至人之上善人，脉寿三纲五常之根，心包百行万善之体，皈依莫尽，称赞何忘，大悲大愿大圣大慈七曲圣父、显庆慈佑仁裕令德王玄初大帝、证果长寿王菩萨储真衍庆天尊。 至心皈命礼　圣母七月初七日诞。 桂香内殿，文昌辅宫。 淑质春和，含太真之淑气，清光秋湛，蕴七夕之清辉，包龙像於未漓，隐鸾机於不露，剑泉之大慈母，蓬莱之上善人，产万世之纲常，生九天之名教，皈依莫尽，称赞何忘，大悲大愿大圣大慈七曲圣母、昭德积庆慈懿恭惠太后、证果宝光菩萨嗣庆储祥元君。 至心皈命礼　元皇天帝二月初三日诞。 桂香宝殿，文昌上宫。 九十六生，种善果於诗书之圃，百千万化，培桂根於阴骘之田，自雷杼炳灵於凤山，至如意储祥於鳌岫，开人心，必本於笃亲之孝，寿国脉，必先於致主之忠，应梦保生，垂慈悯苦，不骄帝境玉真庆宫，现九十八化之行藏，显亿千万劫之神异，飞鸾开化，在在建坛，助国救民，人人被德，功存乎儒道释教，职尽乎天地水官，威灵不可度量，功德果难思议，至仁至孝，不乐不骄，

With utmost sincerity, we bow in reverence to the venerable one dwelling in the blessed land of Gan Mountain, within the Mowei Grotto-Heaven. From a single qi, rooted in the Purple Tenuity’s manifestation, he ascends to the Golden Gate’s Nine Radiances, communicating the vital essence of the Azure Vault. He expounded the Six-Chapter Scripture, refining mortals into sages, and extolled the Wanshou Abbey’s restoration of ancient teachings to enlighten the present. Upholding humanity’s ultimate principle, he awakens the earth’s numinous spirits. His Dao vast beyond naming, his merits too lofty for discourse—great in benevolence, great in filial piety, great in sageliness, great in compassion—he is the Nine Heavens’ Venerable Elder, the Repository of Fortune and Ordainer of Destiny, the Supreme Dao’s Peerless and Most Virtuous Perfected Lord, the Mysterious and True Lord of Myriad Blessings, the Heavenly Venerable.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in reverence to the one originally of the southern lands, who journeyed upstream to Shu’s capital. First, he obtained the Yellow Emperor’s Nine Cauldrons’ cinnabar scriptures; later, he served the Old Lord. Twice at the Jade Bureau, he received the thousand-scroll essentials of cultivation, swiftly mastering the arts of ingestion and exhalation. His registers of the Dao complete, he swore the oath of the Alliance’s威 ranks and sealed the Linjue covenant. Discerning right from wrong, he seized the Court of Fortune’s governance to transform the Springs of Harmony. His virtue perfected in the Great Elixir, his Dao aligned with the Seven Governors—great in compassion, great in vow, great in sageliness, great in compassion—he is the Three Heavens’ Prime Minister, the Mysterious Capital’s Venerable Elder, the Heavenly Master who Upholds the Teaching and Delivers Beings, the Orthodox Unity’s Assistant to the Origin, the Embodied Dao’s Profound and Mysterious Divine Transformation, the Tranquil and Manifest Protector Perfected Lord, the Six Harmonies’ Boundless and Lofty Illustrious Great Emperor, the Demon-Quelling and Dao-Guarding Heavenly Venerable.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in reverence to the everlasting pillar of history, who in the Tang dynasty transformed through the Mysterious. Acquiring wondrous arts to preserve his spirit, he cast off worldly clamor and wearied of service. Mastering the radiant great Dharma of Light and Flower, he awakened to the true mechanism of the myriad existences. His bones ever immortal, he left the trace of a horse leaping into the abyss; his forgiving heart adjudicated cases, bringing forth the auspicious omen of a rat flying through the window. Bestowed the Red Dragon’s Elixir, styled the Azure Paulownia Master—great in compassion, great in vow, great in sageliness, great in compassion—he is the Three Heavens’ Secondary Minister, the Nine Qi’s Venerable Elder, the Cinnabar Forest Great Emperor, the Heavenly Venerable who Adapts to Circumstances and Reveals Transformations.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in reverence to the one born in the Han house, ennobled in the Jin dynasty. Solemnly deploying qi to subdue evil, he once swallowed a tiger to save the world. Holding the Jade Empyrean’s Pure Grotto Dharma, he transmitted the Dark Altar’s Inner Teachings’ scriptures. Presiding over the Thunder Bureau’s judicial and executive affairs, he assumed the Heavenly Master’s office, ascending to the Purple Tenuity Heaven’s Right Minister’s rank. Adjudicating the Dongyang Palace, he governs the Primordial Unity’s Teaching—great in compassion, great in vow, great in sageliness, great in compassion—the Boundless True Origin’s Pure August Emperor, the Nine Heavens’ Protector and Registrar of Destiny, the Heavenly Venerable.

With utmost sincerity, we bow in reverence to the one whose virtue shone in Ba Gorge and whose traces were concealed by the Yu River. In youth, his name was inscribed on the golden tablet; in person, he received the jade steps’ crown and robes. Halting slaughter in response to the Frost Terrace’s dream, he manifested his majesty in the sun’s countenance. Awakening to the Supreme Vehicle to exhort goodness, he befriended and aided the great master. Investigating the Dao of true constancy, he temporarily assumed the role of Chongtian Abbey’s abbot to lecture and refine his virtue, receiving the imperial commendation for benevolent relief. Within the osmanthus-scented palace, host of benevolence and filial piety,

Good roots planted to bear the fruit of longevity.
One family’s flesh and blood without affliction,
Seven-Curved descendants together protecting and sustaining.
Universally vowing for this life and the next,
Before the Purple Cloud Cliff, attaining the Dao’s fruit.
Step by step, heart by heart, at the Emperor’s side,

chunks.original_text: 甘山摩维洞主太玄无上上德真君校正 玄蕴咒 玄元始炁分，清华开洞神。 灵风回太和，玉音摄流精。 至哉本自然，谁识此玄文。 坚刚明一悟，倏忽超三乘。 寂寂无色根，永劫奚漂沉。 胡能精修持，究竟登玉清。 道言：昔在龙汉劫初，元始天王出《大洞玉经》於高上大有玉清宫，演太玄重玄玄一之道，命之曰《大洞仙经》。 元始天王始以太玄一音，流响玉清，弘帝一真道，说大洞宝文，示九统之法，传九光之符，至士诵之，登斋修行即得万神欢庆，百灵护持，万圣感格，万仙翕临，可以飞度三灾四煞、五鬼六害、七伤八难、九厄十恶，登仙入圣，神生紫微，自然无为，不系阴阳五行六炁之所拘束，念念增长，趣入大乘，弘之无穷，诸天下观玉帝降鉴，飞天保迎亿曾万祖历劫种亲，游爽飞魂，俱得更生，世冑接仙，长为贵人，功满道备，骨肉同升，乘龙驾云，上朝玉清。 元始天王啸咏太玄，凝神遐想而说洞章： 高上洞元，元生九天。 炁祖太无，宗风胤玄。 玄曾绝散，四清抚闲。 帝一上景，连众摄烟。 长契一运，七世投闲。 托灵属命，反华自然。 泯邈流辉，六曜沉迁。 陵范御晖，西华彰安。 并编帝简，尽得解源。 胎田邃路，世发玉兰。 灵光八辉，混生万神。 元始天王曰： 玉虚顺玄归，天晨金霄游。 朗朗生帝景，欻尔宴玉洲。 左摄始童神，右命起恒符。 明真焕九霄，三日映玄敷。 干景并三衿，内有幽寥无。 令我得长年，千劫始一周。 黄箓保德仞，披锦入神丘。 太一务命根，公子召合符。 十回度初心，得入大信根。 元始天王曰： 玉帝玄上旛，制命九天阶。 七觉成道数，欢熙神风回。 飙灿北停华，紫英唱东琼。 琳和九霄外，玉符征太微。 三素生泥丸，发曜金灵晖。 老君牢张上，守卫死节机。 十善生玄中，度厄而自然。 元始天王曰： 太冥绝九玄，洞景寄神通。 玉帝乘朱霄，绿霞焕金墉。 上馆云珠内，仰接玄仞峰。 灵关太漠下，蔼沬竟冲空。 冥化混离坎，玄玄叔火王。 玮寂高同生，无极保谷童。 圆涂无凝滞，绮合有九重。 南披七祖根，西解累劫凶。 体娇万津波，神生摄十方。 大归反胎辕，三合乘天龙。 元始天王日： 太微天帝宫，八浮入云营。 神宗理灵襟，龙山秀玉京。 金房郁明霞，九户朗高琼。 黄庭涉北元，元父左回明。 朱晶启明师，幽寥登上清。 四玄秉元禁，长保五帝城。 元始天王曰： 紫精太无中，三元上景衢。 秀朗保太晖，眇眇扇帝敷。 伯史启三素，帝灵登玉虚。 庆炁育五云，司命神明初。 十华妙行仙，制魔生六明。 元始天王曰： 真阳帝宾老，受事会玉皇。 灭魔除秽水，百司诣绛宫。 逸宅丹玄内，五炁结十方。 七转司命至，三回召仙公。 泰山主鬼者，急校三官中。 十德初成基，同飞七觉元。 元始天王曰： 太素三华炁，晨登广灵堂。 玉宾表玄籍，守命孩道康。 徊风散万魔，金符召广乡。 辅卫地户内，保此长生王。 转入十仙门，八景齐洞阳。 元始天王曰： 紫精毓华林，长暝太无外。 玉房生宝云，九扇胞胎内。 帝宾奉五符，三光回紫盖。 苍玉斌来生，卫此长夜会。 五灵度符籍，九统合九光。 三玄出太清，紫阳发万生。 玄精育九灵，元父结胎仙。 元始天王曰： 青灵扇八炁，鼓轮三华城。 拔兆胞胎结，七世受福生。

The Master of Gan Mountain’s Mowei Grotto, Supreme and Unsurpassed True Lord of Highest Virtue, Rectifies the Mysterious Storehouse Incantation:

The Primordial qi of the Mysterious Origin divides,
Pure radiance opens the grotto’s spirits.
A numinous wind revolves the Great Harmony,
Jade tones gather the flowing essence.
Supreme is this, fundamentally natural—
Who recognizes this mysterious text?
Firm and resolute, illumined in singular awakening,
In an instant one transcends the Three Vehicles.
Still and silent, without root of form,
Through kalpas eternal, how could one drift or sink?
Who can refine and uphold this practice?
Ultimately, one ascends to Jade Clarity.

The Dao speaks: In the primordial Dragon Han kalpa, the Celestial King of the Origin of Origins revealed *The Jade Sutra of the Great Grotto* within the Highest and Vast Jade Clarity Palace. He expounded the Dao of the Supreme Mystery and the Mystery of Mysteries, naming it *The Great Grotto Sutra of the Immortals*. The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins first intoned the Supreme Mystery in a single sound, its resonance flowing through Jade Clarity. He propagated the Imperial Singular True Dao, proclaimed the precious texts of the Great Grotto, demonstrated the methods of the Nine Governances, and transmitted the talismans of the Nine Lights. When scholars recite these, upon purifying themselves and cultivating practice, they immediately gain the joyous celebration of the myriad spirits, the protection of the hundred numina, the resonance of the ten thousand sages, and the presence of the ten thousand immortals. Thereby, one may transcend the Three Calamities and Four Malevolences, the Five Demons and Six Harms, the Seven Injuries and Eight Difficulties, the Nine Adversities and Ten Evils. One ascends as an immortal, enters sagehood, and the spirit is born in Purple Tenuity. Naturally and effortlessly, one is unbound by the constraints of yin and yang, the Five Phases, or the Six qi. With each thought, one grows, hastening toward the Great Vehicle, propagating it endlessly. The myriad heavens below observe, and the Jade Emperor descends his gaze. Flying immortals safeguard and welcome one’s ancestors through kalpas past, their ethereal souls and wandering spirits all attaining rebirth. Lineages connect with immortals, becoming eternally noble. When merit is fulfilled and the Dao perfected, flesh and bone ascend together, riding dragons and driving clouds to ascend and pay homage in Jade Clarity.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins, whistling and chanting the Supreme Mystery, concentrated his spirit in distant contemplation and proclaimed the Grotto’s chapters:

Supreme Grotto of the Origin,
The Origin gives birth to the Nine Heavens.
The Ancestor of qi is the Supreme Nonbeing,
The lineage of wind inherits the Mystery.
The Mystery’s transmission once severed,
The Four Clarities soothed and pacified.
The Imperial Singular’s Upper Radiance,
Linked with the multitudes, gathers the mists.
Long bound to the singular destiny,
Seven generations cast into tranquility.
Entrusting the numinous, attaching to life,
Returning to the splendor of the natural.
Vast and distant, flowing radiance,
The Six Luminaries sink and shift.
Ascending the model, wielding brilliance,
Western Florescence manifests peace.
All inscribed in the Imperial Registers,
Fully attaining liberation at the source.
The Womb Field’s profound path,
Generations bring forth jade orchids.
Numinous light of eightfold radiance,
Intermingling births the myriad spirits.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Jade Emptiness follows the Mystery in return,
Roaming the Golden Dawn of the Celestial Morn.
Brightly shines the Imperial Radiance,
Suddenly one feasts on Jade Isle.
To the left, the Beginning Youth is gathered,
To the right, the Eternal Talisman is summoned.
Illuminating the true, resplendent in the Nine Heavens,
Three suns reflect the unfolding Mystery.
The Dry Radiance joins the Three Collars,
Within lies the profound and boundless void.
Grant me long years,
A thousand kalpas mark but one cycle.
The Yellow Register guards virtue’s measure,
Donning brocade, one enters the divine mounds.
The Supreme Singular attends to the root of life,
The Duke’s son summons the united talisman.
Ten revolutions fulfill the initial resolve,
Attaining entry into the root of great faith.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Jade Emperor’s Mysterious Upper Banner,
Commands the steps of the Nine Heavens.
The Seven Awakenings complete the Dao’s reckoning,
Joyous and harmonious, the divine wind returns.
The whirlwind gleams, halting in Northern Florescence,
Purple blossoms sing in Eastern Jasper.
Jade harmony beyond the Nine Heavens,
The Jade Talisman summons Supreme Tenuity.
The Three Pristines give birth in the Mud Pill,
Radiating the golden numinous brilliance.
The Venerable Lord firmly upholds the summit,
Guarding the mechanism of life and death’s fidelity.
The Ten Virtues arise within the Mystery,
Transcending adversity, naturally.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Supreme Darkness severs the Nine Mysteries,
The Grotto’s radiance entrusts divine communion.
The Jade Emperor rides the Vermilion Dawn,
Green auroras illumine the golden ramparts.
The Upper Palace within the cloud’s pearls,
Gazing upward, one meets the Mysterious Summit’s peak.
The Numinous Pass beneath the Great Desert,
Mists and foam surge into the void.
The Dark Transformation blends Kan and Li,
The Mysterious of Mysteries, the Young Fire King.
Rare stillness, lofty and co-arising,
The Boundless protects the Valley Youth.
The Round Way knows no stagnation,
Wondrous union possesses nine layers.
To the south, the roots of seven ancestors are untied,
To the west, the misfortunes of accumulated kalpas are dissolved.
The body transcends the myriad tidal waves,
The spirit gathers the ten directions.
Great return reverses the Womb Chariot,
The Three Unions ride the Celestial Dragon.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Palace of the Celestial Emperor of Supreme Tenuity,
Eight floats enter the cloud’s encampment.
The Divine Clan governs the numinous heart,
Dragon Mountain flourishes in Jade Capital.
The Golden Chamber dense with bright auroras,
Nine gates gleam with lofty jasper.
The Yellow Court traverses Northern Origin,
The Origin Father turns left in radiance.
Vermilion crystal awakens the Illuminating Master,
The profound and boundless ascends Upper Clarity.
The Four Mysteries hold the Origin’s prohibitions,
Eternally safeguarding the Five Emperor Cities.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Within the Purple Essence of Supreme Nonbeing,
The Three Origins ascend the Radiant Way.
Flourishing and bright, guarding the Supreme Brilliance,
Vast and distant, fanning the Imperial unfolding.
The Earl of History initiates the Three Pristines,
The Imperial Numen ascends Jade Emptiness.
Auspicious qi nurtures the Five Clouds,
The Controller of Destinies, the numinous inception.
The Ten Florals, wondrous immortal practices,
Subdue demons, giving birth to the Six Illuminations.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The True Yang’s Imperial Guest, the Venerable,
Receives affairs in the Jade Emperor’s court.
Annihilating demons, purging filthy waters,
The hundred offices proceed to the Crimson Palace.
The Leisurely Abode within Cinnabar Mystery,
The Five qi bind the ten directions.
Seven revolutions, the Controller of Destinies arrives,
Three returns summon the Immortal Duke.
The Lord of Ghosts of Mount Tai,
Swiftly examines within the Three Offices.
The Ten Virtues form the initial foundation,
Together flying with the Seven Awakening Origins.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Three Floral qi of Supreme Pristine,
At dawn ascend the Vast Numinous Hall.
The Jade Guest manifests the Mysterious Register,
Guarding life, the child’s Dao is at peace.
The revolving wind scatters the myriad demons,
The golden talisman summons the vast realm.
Assisting and safeguarding within the Earth’s Gates,
Protecting this King of Eternal Life.
Turning, one enters the Ten Immortal Gates,
The Eight Sceneries together illumine the Grotto’s yang.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Purple Essence nurtures the Floral Grove,
Eternally dark beyond Supreme Nonbeing.
The Jade Chamber gives birth to precious clouds,
Within the ninefold womb and embryo.
The Imperial Guest presents the Five Talismans,
The Three Lights revolve the Purple Canopy.
Azure jade refines the coming life,
Safeguarding this Eternal Night Assembly.
The Five Numinous transmit the talismanic registers,
The Nine Governances unite the Nine Lights.
The Three Mysteries emerge from Supreme Clarity,
Purple Yang emits the myriad lives.
Mysterious essence nurtures the Nine Numinous,
The Origin Father binds the Womb Immortals.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Azure Numinous fans the Eight qi,
Drumming the wheels of the Three Floral City.
Liberating the embryo’s knots of the multitudes,
Seven generations receive blessed birth.

chunks.original_text: 宿对灭五道，长守帝一营。 公子执五符，太一居紫房。 三合地户下，拔命玉帝宫。 少女郁墨子，卫兆七炁窗。 拘制盟血液，盈满五藏充。 十真登黄房，帝子化金仙。 白玉飞符招，引升龙台天。 元始天王曰： 高上宴紫霄，五老辅玉根。 太素拂眇景，合符帝一前。 白帝皓郁将，回金太霞乡。 度我死户下，拔出三途梁。 十通由斯生，妙行由此兴。 洞明光景中，帝一真玄玄。 太上无极总真文昌大洞仙经卷之三竟 太上无极总真文昌大洞仙经卷之四 甘山摩维洞主太玄无上上德真君校正 道言：尔时，元始天王眉放青毫，顶旋紫炁，万华宝盖，浮罗覆形，玉光金霞，纡绚晃耀。 玉宸道君太玄道父，稽首颙伫，愿听洞章，於是元始天王怡然啸咏曰： 皇上超无景，轮转九曜生。 徊风混帝心，八炁运常宁。 广霞参神天，五帝散日精。 液溢元中漠，血凝五华平。 体宝圆珠映，流曜拔兆形。 号为寿逸阜，亦曰澄溱渟。 俱济三涂关，启籍登太明。 使子保仙真，七世披缘青。 解祸冥途下，超福晨上灵。 世世登玉乡，累祖反胎婴。 洞观无碍空，始通生因明。 骊珠湛方瞳，内外洞照清。 元始天王曰： 玉宸九天司，太上大道生。 常保景化内，九回镜上清。 解带玉映室，乘素入四明。 擭提日中王，并羽月晨灵。 太一召天魔，帝君校万精。 拔过死积炁，越度仙黄庭。 帝立三关上，八风舞神兵。 左把福醴液，右提庆源缾。 洞微无障玄，梵通生虚明。 贯颡闻十方，豁落一切声。 元始天王曰： 泰清浮绝空，三天宝神符。 日中开五晖，青帝圆常无。 捧籍登太明，受录金华楼。 五藏植玉根，魂魄一凝和。 洞空清净玄，炁通生清明。 定和妙明觉，玄息自长生。 元始天王曰： 太极元景王，三天摄神生。 紫素翳郁仞，安来上华京。 拔出五苦积，返胎七元庭。 九玄解重结，累祖乐锦清。 徘徊秀华下，俯仰要五灵。 兆身升玉堂，五神回孩婴。 俱跻太漠外，养素朝圆明。 洞虚清净和，华通引玄明。 砥炼五牙珠，含善味长生。 元始天王曰： 皇初紫元中，晖光郁霄明。 三天焕九景，离合亿万生。 披珠巾绿霞，上徊寒童灵。 拔出五苦毒，超身过始青。 白素启萧仞，金门卫朱兵。 七世积尸结，一化百散倾。 受福东霞室，反胎朱火庭。 洞灵清净行，力通自冲明。 净真手握斗，足蹑九元星。 挥执天地关，精神生命根。 元始天王曰： 无英真上玄，玄元九素炁。 寄频携运珠，混化启明日。 正一左右仙，长扶灵虚室。 兆有玉符籍，合仙得真炁。 魂生太无中，魄亦五道会。 世世解死户，七祖无住滞。 神风吹胞树，根叶已断绝。 胎中种鬼殃，五符开地结。 长为神真王，应仙续万世。 洞真清净身，道通自然质。 真应化现相，不动住黄室。 应化无方在，骨肉金玉实。 静真明正道，至老长不易。 元始天王曰： 中央黄素炁，圆华玉寿灵。 太张上玉门，伏云三仞明。 青景翳逸寥，携提太一精。 帝女抱定陵，吟咏玉清经。 五籍编紫房，五符入圆庭。 七祖反胎宅，灭绝三途生。 流风断血滞，玄叶得黄宁。 洞玄清净光，元命灵通成。 性命宗本坚，孝道成明王。 生根得太和，无为登上清。 元始天王曰： 青精上华炁，太微玄景童。 神化玉室内，飞羽逸紫空。 日为三衿交，奉符登帝墉。 开关把金节，闭户扣琼锺。

chunks.original_text: 灭魔三酆野，招灵上清宫。 明出穷关阴，入精六合房。 回老变皓形，还白返婴童。 洞源清净光，津液具神通。 咽液生万神，神水华池融。 涌升灌而润，往来无有穷。 通生道之源，天根常茂丰。 元始天王曰： 太阳化三晨，紫軿微玄下。 元君保谷童，守胃塞死户。 金符焕北华，玉契拔七祖。 帝真灌上生，断我三途苦。 洞明清净光，帝心大玄通。 宿命过去智，根本元由中。 未来及他心，一切无碍融。 洞源与洞明，万道由通生。 元始天王曰： 太初九素炁，炁出华景中。 法垣舞仙旗，逡巡五老公。 天人名启珠，执籍归紫房。 元父左回明，混会太微童。 洞清明智慧，太意朗元通。 根尘悉消灭，有无皆虚空。 妙行真一全，名大心神通。 道备登玉清，位为圣仙翁。 元天王曰： 元始授太玄，苍胡颉宝珠。 檀炽钧音妙，希声彻太虚。 九皇上真炁，四司大仙王。 飞霞散天日，凝涣六合房。 上清朝玉虚，乘景晨晖中。 三神号发纽，捧籍启虚皇。 逸录登紫清，金符刻羽宫。 顶玄苍胡颉，弘济登普光。 运度玄中人，咽味生五芳。 结集成胎仙，丹母金真阳。 主伴合元范，太易生玄乡。 太上无极总真文昌大洞仙经卷之四竟 太上无极总真文昌大洞仙经卷之五 甘山摩维洞主太玄无上上德真君校正 道言：尔时 ，元始天王以大洞高上混沌太无元天宝玉皇之炁，结一宝珠，命之曰苍胡颉，曰：吾以此宝珠从道妙一，善贷生根，孕玄分元，诞始传真，化生诸天，凝成万炁，大哉至宝，惟我独存。 今为玉宸道君重出斯宝，诸天帝王、天真大圣瞻望宝光，其光分敷百千万亿，结成《大洞仙经》玉文，凝而成云，绚而成章，诸天帝王天真大圣，以清明识，以始通观，以华舌通，齐声宣咏大洞云章，响彻万天，流响九地，天界地界，水界神乡，一切神灵，不离本坐，俱睹云章，绚目仙梵，历耳皆悉，百生障灭，万劫尘消，三涂九幽，十方恶趣，咸承光音，所及十缠九结六染七尘，於是顷间一时解脱。 是时太玄道父前诣萧台，再拜稽首，求受宝珠所结《大洞仙经》玉文云章，庶以导化人天众生，俱免万灾，咸消众罪，不沉恶趣，俱等一乘，弘是愿育，殷勤启请。 元始天王命元神大圣玉宸道君具俯仰威仪，手付太玄道父苍胡颉宝。 元始天王告曰：此苍胡颉宝，与檀炽钧音，若非太玄，可得求请，唯子慈深愿重，可畀宝章。 元始天王曰： 天皇上真炁，三元乘晨回。 法垣兴朱霄，帝晶启玉扉。 拔尸命门内，解结桃康阶。 敛神保五籍，越转入太微。 单入而双修，一曲水天开。 海日自东生，元命生太初。 元始天王曰： 太一生元炁，日中司命童。 焕然神光明，披霞升帝墉。 列坐震灵席，混合五日房。 白炁育 上生，青君安延昌。 左携精上门，右抱合和婴。 我生日月华，友宾赤炁王。 八景照泥丸，朗然洞房中。 婴儿为赤子，混离生玉容。 五道秀金华，位为上清公。 七祖断玄滞，身得乘神风。 徘徊玉清上，和乐反婴童。 太始三炁周，真文肇生明。 元始天王曰： 元虚黄房内，中有黄宁童。 左有坚玉君，右有帝昌皇。 浮清翳神炁，蔚蔚虚灵容。 青肝明轮子，开朗彻八窗。 太一寿丘兰，奉符入玉宫。 拔我七世罪，回元期十通。 混合帝一室，五老变孩蒙。 太素梵行初，一善四金通。

The Heavenly August Ones’ Upper Perfected qi,

Resplendent with numinous radiant light,

Seated in array upon the Thunder Spirit’s mat,

White qi nurtures Upper Life,
The Azure Lord secures prolonged prosperity.
Left, grasping the Gate of Essence Above,
Right, embracing the Infant of Union and Harmony.
My life generates the sun and moon’s splendor,
Fellow guests with the Red Qi King.
Eight Auroras illuminate the Mud Pill,
Luminously within the Cavern’s Chamber.
The infant becomes the Red Child,
Merging and parting to generate the Jade Countenance.
The Five Dao flourish with golden splendor,
Attaining the rank of Upper Clarity Lord.
The seven ancestors sever the mysterious stagnation,
The body attains to ride the spirit wind.
Wandering above Jade Clarity,
Harmoniously returning as an infant child.
The Great Beginning’s three qi cycle,
The Perfected Writ inaugurates luminous life.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Within the Primordial Void’s Yellow Chamber,
There resides the Yellow Tranquility Child.
To the left, the Firm Jade Lord,
To the right, the Imperial Prosperity August.
Floating clarity veils the spirit qi,
Luxuriant and vast, the empty numinous countenance.
The Azure Liver’s Bright Wheel Child,
Opening and illuminating through the Eight Windows.
The Great One and Longevity Mound’s orchid,
Presenting tallies to enter the Jade Palace.
Extricating my seven generations’ sins,
Revolving the primordial to await the Ten Penetrations.
Merging within the Emperor’s One Chamber,
The Five Elders transform into infant ignorance.
The Great Simplicity’s Brahmanic practice begins,
One goodness penetrates the Four Golds.

chunks.original_text: 元始天王曰： 太极主四真，凌羽逸上清。 七转召司命，太一扬威明。 司录促诣位，三举登震灵。 魔王来受事，仙官束鬼精。 月中青帝母，号曰芬艳婴。 太张上五符，安来上玉名。 混化六合内，洞房列火兵。 太极五灵冲，横文帝子宾。 元始天王曰： 斗中四真人，散花玉清台。 帝卿中玄生，一徊众真来。 香风扇三宝，五藏映清夷。 苍胡颉光华，檀炽钧吉祥。 太中六炁清，曲水襄天河。 六度功圆成，五魔伐六阴。 中结元始王，高观六合庭。 元始天王曰： 晨中黄景炁，三秀登霄庭。 沧台飞羽轮，延迎道已成。 司命奉帝书，号为玄度卿。 保生太霞宫，列宾馆上清。 命门合精延，守我身黄宁。 左携元素君，右摄朱郁灵。 太和度七觉，点火生真文。 紫华领胎仙，元命真中神。 元始天王曰： 金阙上景炁，十方晖紫烟。 三命太一帝，五召太平神。 七转招岳真，玉符告三官。 拔籍三灵下，受生高上晨。 太帝八灵王，一化回庆玄。 桃君守六合，勒精卫泥丸。 太清八景观，十德真文宣。 保子神中神，元命生自然。 元始天王曰： 太虚空无景，霞中有彭室。 九云合重扉，帝君静幽密。 八真合景君，上携女太一。 雌雄混玉房，九变还得七。 分形散六合，泥丸易分别。 太真九光轮，十佺丿文结。 保子元炁通，五炁理中颉。 混一归帝阙，永寿无终劫。 变化飞上清，三千行超越。 元始天王曰： 太玄九炁上，烟回大晖间。 神光秀空峰，五道焕三天。 驾景登绝霄，乘风荡滞神。 中一日运珠，理心入清闲。 混合三五宫，累变亿万年。 伐绝胞树生，永断血尸根。 七祖散积滞，返华黑幽玄。 万炁生万神，齐仙成仙王。 太玄启十明，妙行登十真。 元始天王曰： 上清绝霞外，八皇运九天。 幽寥生帝宇，携此景中人。 晨登太老寝，夕宴金华轩。 羽节命太一，锦旗招万神。 坚我六府胎，伐灭胞树根。 解结生七祖，散祸宁九玄。 赤帝丹灵峙，扶兆入玉门。 月母灵素兰，守闭死炁关。 死炁自今绝，生津从兹延。 万神万炁仙，超脱位真王。 十真妙行全，太玄会明阳。 无上大洞尊，一炁同龙光。 元始天王曰： 东华发始晖，高晨映上清。 焕洞圆珠蔼，朗朗紫曜明。 七神回帝席，五老飞玉軿。 太一景中立，司命摄万精。 泛然云波间，寂盻泥丸城。 七转召三官，北君稽首灵。 五岳应炁到，拔死书长生。 三举震灵符，玄解大魔精。 七祖解血结，玄华保黄宁。 元始天王曰： 太帝九老京，校仙登扶桑。 七转召天帝，司命乘神纲。 五岳启灵户，传声大魔王。 河海皆受事，立尔应会方。 保符泥丸内，守神曰桃康。 回明易死籍，记仙叔火王。 拔绝三途疾，去祸生上英。 七玄登朱室，兆身会玉堂。 上友方盈子，下携理维藏。 左摄明车君，右辅归盛昌。 混一玉京炁，化兆吉以昌。 反婴元命童，檀炽吉祥钧。 天一元根仙，自在光明轮。 元始天王曰： 玉清万华宫，高仙藏帝经。 主图九天表，洞观无中生。 七转召万神，五岳一来庭。 三官招众魔，司录校所呈。 拔籍重泉曲，记仙书上清。 元始天王曰： 玄洲绝三津，羽景太无庭。 回霄飞垂漠，委化混万精。 五云蔚绝空，七霞落圆明。 朗朗幽寥子，梵昌济黄宁。 五老挥绛华，散香携玉灵。 金质濯帝川，绿烟蔼流琼。 神拔三涂积，仙胎结兆形。

The Supreme Ultimate governs the Four Perfected,
Soaring on feathered wings through the Upper Clarity.
Seven revolutions summon the Controller of Destinies,
As the Great One displays radiant majesty.
The Recorder hastens to the appointed station,
Threefold ascent to the numinous Thunder.
Demon kings come to receive their duties,
Immortal officials bind ghostly essences.
Within the moon dwells the Azure Emperor’s Mother,
Named Fragrant Radiance Infant.
The Great Expansion unfolds the Five Talismans,
Peacefully inscribing the Jade Register above.
Within the Six Harmonies all transforms,
The Bridal Chamber arrays the Fire Soldiers.
The Supreme Ultimate’s Five Numinous Surges,
The Emperor’s Son as guest with the Horizontal Script.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Within the Dipper dwell the Four Perfected,
Scattering blossoms upon the Jade Clarity Terrace.
The Imperial Minister engenders the Central Mystery,
One revolution and the host of Perfected arrive.
Fragrant winds fan the Three Treasures,
The Five Viscera reflect the Clear Tranquility.
The Azure Hu’s luminous splendor,
The Sandalwood’s blazing auspicious hook.
The Great Centrality’s Six Qi purify,
The Winding Waters embrace the Celestial River.
The Six Perfections’ merit is perfected,
The Five Demons fell the Six Yin.
At the center binds the King of the Origin of Origins,
Gazing from on high upon the Six Harmonies’ court.

At dawn the Yellow Radiance qi,
Threefold refinement ascends the Empyrean court.
From the Azure Terrace the feathered wheels take flight,

The Controller of Destinies presents the Emperor’s writ,

Preserving life within the Great Rosy Cloud Palace,

To the left he grasps the Primordial Simplicity Lord,
To the right he seizes the Vermilion Luxuriance Spirit.
The Great Harmony ferries the Seven Awakenings,
Kindling fire to generate the Perfected Writ.
The Purple Blossom leads the Womb Immortals,
The Origin’s Mandate as the Perfected within the Perfected.

The Three Mandates of the Great One Emperor,
Five summonses to the Great Peace spirits.
Seven revolutions beckon the Peak Perfected,

Receiving rebirth in the Highest Dawn.
The Supreme Emperor of the Eight Numinous,
One transformation returns to Mysterious Felicity.

Inscribing essence to defend the Muddy Pellet.
The Supreme Clarity’s Eightfold Radiance observes,
The Ten Virtues proclaim the Perfected Writ.
Preserving the child as the Perfected within the Perfected,
The Origin’s Mandate arises naturally.

The Great Void holds no scene,
Yet within the rosy clouds stands Peng’s Chamber.
Ninefold clouds seal the layered gates,
The Emperor Lord abides in serene seclusion.
The Eight Perfected join with the Radiance Lord,
Ascending with the Female Great One.
Male and female merge within the Jade Chamber,
Nine transformations return to attain the Seven.
Dispersing forms throughout the Six Harmonies,
The Muddy Pellet’s distinctions are easily made.
The Great Perfected’s Ninefold Light Wheel,
The Ten Companions knot the Writ’s patterns.
Preserving the child’s Origin qi flows,
The Five qi govern the Central Prowess.
Merging as one to return to the Emperor’s watchtower,
Eternal longevity without end or kalpa.
Transforming to soar through the Upper Clarity,
Surpassing the Three Thousand Practices.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Above the Great Mystery’s Nine qi,
Mists swirl amidst the Great Radiance.
Divine light blooms upon the empty peaks,
The Five Paths illumine the Three Heavens.
Mounting the radiance to ascend the Absolute Empyrean,
Riding the winds to dispel stagnant spirits.
Within the center a single sun revolves the pearl,
Governing the heart to enter tranquil leisure.
Merging within the Three and Five Palaces,
Layered transformations through myriad eons.
Felling the womb’s tree at its root,
Forever severing the blood corpse’s source.
Seven ancestors disperse accumulated stagnation,
Returning blossoms to the Dark Mystery’s depths.
Myriad qi generate myriad spirits,
All immortals become Immortal Kings.
The Great Mystery initiates the Ten Clarities,
Wondrous practices ascend the Ten Perfected.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Beyond the Upper Clarity’s Absolute Rosy Clouds,
The Eight Emperors revolve the Nine Heavens.
From the profound and boundless arises the Emperor’s abode,
Bearing these Radiance-dwelling persons.
At dawn ascending the Supreme Elder’s chamber,
At dusk feasting in the Golden Blossom Pavilion.
Feathered tablets command the Great One,
Broidered banners summon the myriad spirits.
Strengthening my Six Palaces’ embryo,
Felling the womb tree’s root.
Untying the knots of the seven ancestors,
Dispersing calamities to pacify the Nine Mysteries.
The Vermilion Emperor’s Cinnabar Numinous stands guard,
Supporting the omen to enter the Jade Gate.
The Moon Mother’s Numinous Simplicity Orchid,
Guards the closure of the death qi’s pass.
From this day forth death qi is forever severed,
Life’s fluids henceforth extend.
Myriad spirits and myriad qi immortals,
Transcending to become Perfected Kings.
The Ten Perfected’s wondrous practices complete,
The Great Mystery unites the Bright Yang.

The Supreme Worthy of the Great Cavern,
One qi conjoins with the Dragon’s Radiance.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
Eastern Florescence emits its first radiance,
The High Dawn reflects the Upper Clarity.
Resplendent the Luminous Pearl’s mist,
Lustrous the Purple Brilliance’s clarity.
Seven spirits return to the Emperor’s seat,
Five Elders fly upon jade carriages.

Floating amidst the cloud waves,

Seven revolutions summon the Three Bureaus,
The Northern Lord bows to the numinous.

Extracting death’s register for eternal life.
Threefold ascent of the Thunder Numinous talisman,
Mysteriously dissolving the Great Demon’s essence.
Seven ancestors untie the blood knots,
The Dark Blossom preserves the Yellow Tranquility.

The Supreme Emperor’s Nine Elders’ capital,

Seven revolutions summon the Celestial Emperor,

The Five Peaks open their numinous portals,

Guarding the spirit named Peach Prosperity.
Reversing illumination to alter death’s register,
Recording immortality as the Fire King’s uncle.
Severing the Three Paths’ afflictions,

To the left seizing the Bright Chariot Lord,
To the right assisting the Return to Prosperity.
Merging the Jade Capital’s qi as one,
Transforming the omen to flourish in auspiciousness.
Returning to infancy as the Origin’s Mandate Child,
The Sandalwood blazes with the Auspicious Hook.
The Celestial One’s Origin Root Immortal,
Free within the Wheel of Luminous Radiance.

The Three Bureaus beckon the host of demons,

Extracting the registers from the Yellow Springs’ depths,
Recording immortality in the Upper Clarity’s annals.

Upon the Dark Continent beyond the Three Fordings,
The Feathered Radiance’s Supreme Non-Being court.
Revolving empyreans fly into the boundless,
Entrusting transformation to merge the myriad essences.
Five clouds luxuriate in the absolute void,
Seven rosy clouds descend upon the Perfect Clarity.
Lustrous the Profound and Boundless Child,
The Brahmanic Prosperity aids the Yellow Tranquility.

Scattering fragrance to bear the Jade Numinous.
Golden substance washes in the Emperor’s river,
Green mists luxuriate with flowing jade.
Divine extraction of the Three Paths’ accumulations,
Immortal embryo knits the omen’s form.

The Three Perfected give birth to the Grand Prime,
Jade portals reflect the dawn’s radiance.
The Grand Simplicity penetrates the primal void,
Cinnabar groves bristle with crimson branches.
Returning spirit to the ninefold palace,

The Dark Mystery rests in the Three Effulgences’ vale.

Long preserved beyond the kalpa’s end,
For myriad ages they become the immortals’ lineage.
Enthroned as the sagely lineage’s sovereign,
The Jade Clarity’s Grand Cavern spirit.

The Celestial King of the Origin of Origins says:
The Western Prime’s ninefold numinous qi,
Golden elixir flows through the cloud palace.
Above, the supreme jade brilliance transcribes,
Radiant scenes within the Grand Rosy Clouds.
Moving, it revolves the nine heavens’ wheel,
Still, it sinks the eight currents’ net.
Within the chamber dwells the Embryo Immortal Mother,
Who bears the lapels of the Grand Thearch.
The Mysterious Unity’s spirit arises in time,
The Three Elders spread the plain white canopy.
Left hand grasps the omen’s talismanic register,
Right hand carries the governance of the divine lineage.
Together they ascend the numinous dragon’s gate,
Bowing heads in the Jade Clarity’s chamber.
Uprooting the roots of death and extinction,
Nurturing form within the Three and Five.
Seven ancestors dissolve the corpse’s knots,
Receiving blessings from the luminous pearl’s realm.
Above, they attest to the sagely sovereign within,
Talisman-transformed into the Primordial Qi’s king.

The Great Dao Lord of the Jade Heaven says:
My master, the Celestial King of the Origin of Origins, bestowed upon me this *Grand Cavern Sutra of the Immortals*. Its purport is profound and recondite, the wondrous gate of cultivating truth.

First, stabilize the regulated breath—
A thousand harmonies of Grand Harmony.
Midway, contemplate the transformation into truth,
Dissolving forms to disperse dust.
Five thousand primal unities converge,
Sitting in presence, standing in absence.
Grand stabilization perfects truth,
Wondrous practice connects with the numinous.

Next is the circulation of spirit,
Finally, the circulation of the numinous.
Ten circulations complete the truth,
The Dao perfected, ascending to the celestial court,
Transcending and soaring beyond,
Passing through the Three Realms,
Coming and going within the Three Clarities,
Attaining the rank of Grand Cavern,
Heavenly One, Thearchic Sovereign.
Six perfections, ten circulations,
Myriad practices perfected,
A thousand harmonies, myriad unions,
Naturally attaining the supreme.

Thus concludes the fifth scroll of the *Grand Cavern Sutra of the Supreme Vastness, the All-True Wenchang*.
